cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6e962a5b-ffe6-47d1-92ca-5797b20915aa","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"關於我 About"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"5797c0fa-b075-4afb-919e-0ef26efcf8a1","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202403061314439.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"40%","originalHeight":409,"originalWidth":657,"alignment":"left"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab5f7436-4050-4025-8961-5a4d0684f723"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你好，我是稻流Daoliu，歡迎來到這片水稻田！"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"407f49c3-1ffd-47dc-a9b4-d7ee6f902fa6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"這裡是我分享自己的空間。我經常回想自己生活中所遇到的大小事，並且望著它們問道：「你對於我的意義會是什麼呢？」"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"},{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"；"},{"type":"text","text":"然而種種想法需要時間生長，為此我得經常提醒自己：「寫不完記得先吃飯，肚子才不會咕嚕咕嚕叫。」"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"77dd70f6-cfc6-4fa3-9c9b-f292da74d481"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"若這些收穫也剛好適合你，那會是我的榮幸:D"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4e3f966-1916-4743-9f32-f678003bfbb8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"──"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"db873c5c-f251-4e29-b618-3e0bfb401672"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"每篇標題的開頭，都附有下列符號其一，它們分別表示："}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"441595e3-6ad1-4be7-b9ce-918984844cdb"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"324b7e2e-1740-477d-9774-5b0af7b5be95"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🌾：想法已熟成，可以採收！"}]}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"84246a1c-c8fb-418d-aee7-3af4fe430171"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b512eedd-5e89-4d20-a940-639b6a08ddf3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭：尚需耕耘，容我再想想。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"76b33b0a-9745-44d5-a1be-b6e12bd243ec"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我會推薦優先參觀「🌾」的篇章，因為其內容架構是比較完整的。希望大家在閱讀時，能夠更輕鬆一些！"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"003d6771-45ec-49b7-a557-97021fb0d639","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文章 Articles"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"12b660e4-f535-49fc-ad4c-b3ed7aca7aa1","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b19154e5-2f7f-4584-b917-d23bd0b63466"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a52594d3-e4ff-4b8a-9a70-1df5304cb748"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2e2df05a-4977-47c5-918d-266904ff298c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f47c99cc-c4de-4984-ab89-025fcf9bfe3d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"138c3d37-8f2f-447b-aa72-3696ebc26dd8"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0842a413-f53c-47bf-b14f-bc6e00d92024","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c528ac94-a20c-485c-9590-0aef13946219"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8724db72-0b68-4dda-9f2a-038c3ac3163b"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"55278f7e-1219-4e75-a19f-a29cec483a6a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"df9c5d2a-45eb-4a75-b376-1e41fbaa751c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d2372816-0b65-4657-bbd9-7a813e095b14"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"892beef3-8890-45cc-ae16-c3ff849d74b3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"820b0699-dbe1-40de-8311-6b0372a32575"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6fbad2d9-43a2-4545-abd3-57158ca77f0e"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"02763372-2dbb-4304-9807-ff7afbec61d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/87247526-363e-4ce0-9a62-49d6b5413650","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"全文章導覽"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/87247526-363e-4ce0-9a62-49d6b5413650","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}},{"type":"color","attrs":{"typ {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d0b9b1e4-654d-4f01-b8d3-fe45b535a07e","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"💭"},{"type":"text","text":"邏輯連接詞表"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8aafb26-ed75-488f-ac07-65d152c62927"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"整體架構與大部分的「常見」連接詞，均源自書籍"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d1a99f01-991c-4598-a0a9-2c37181350ba"}},{"type":"hard_break"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a27fa6a-9217-43db-95b8-14c9c015fa02"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此外，我在詞表中又加上「文謅謅」的連接詞分類。為的是方便個人區分平日書寫及考試申論的用詞。不過兩者分類（常見與文謅謅）之間並沒有客觀標準──只要我閱讀手邊資料時，覺得句子與句子之間的關係不好懂，那麼其中的連接詞就有很高的機會被我歸在「文謅謅」分類。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"dcfe897e-1747-430e-aa07-3b72aa40322f","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"順接與附加"}]},{"type":"table","attrs":{"id":"e75712b5-f3ab-4438-804d-40f4d865fdd7","hasRowHeader":false,"hasColumnHeader":false},"content":[{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"285a09e0-d74e-4be1-86bd-d0e255417c2b"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"5dcec373-4e58-4147-8907-26de82f573ce","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[120],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d5d6bd96-1ddf-424b-b8f9-ff98e51b1246"}}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"98c132eb-35b9-48ca-b76a-1dc5f5a09dde","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[191.1624679404704],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"94877a09-c91b-46a5-8333-1b38492da7cb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"常見"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"490ebb76-1c99-4995-8130-ce9215107450","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[120],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fb862634-0222-4460-8fe3-86df81fb4f38"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文謅謅"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"aac3b46f-98a9-4c43-a1ff-8a8f4f78b88d"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"c9da {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"23e009ff-fe12-4b75-b706-b589150b131a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭寫給Blog開發者的支持"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0a8d4b5-d206-48a7-9379-86b80eb6a4a8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"謝謝"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://notes.dabing.one/post?note-id=b81a2f54-ec5b-4de0-9e97-ab841c0e18f9&active-note-id=b81a2f54-ec5b-4de0-9e97-ab841c0e18f9","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Jiang開發的數字花園"},{"type":"text","text":"！✨"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fa2cab68-f7da-4c94-8944-fdd42e2b250e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5ce18be7-cfab-4dd1-b3e5-2a9eb79b5e0a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"這款工具使得從0開始寫Bolg的我，能夠漸漸放下恐懼，鼓起勇氣對外分享自己的想法。我曾嘗試過其他Blog平台，但是每當我想要在後台按下發布按鈕，我便會不斷質疑自己寫的內容是否足夠完整，或者意思是不是自己真正想表達的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92ba2e92-5aa8-4929-acc0-7f1719eea22c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0bad3f1f-f6e3-4441-8e13-8ae0f0f3e45f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以我過去接觸的經驗來說，Blog首頁的文章排序大多會著重於「文章第一次發布的時間」。換言之，當觀眾打開我的網站，第一眼就會看到我新發布的內容，那讓我在書寫過程中很有壓力──我會過度追求文章的完整性，那每每造成我寫一兩個段落就想放棄。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"afff94fd-4fd9-49c6-abfe-2bbe2054cfc4"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e361f609-5df4-44a2-ab99-26d98abaeb01"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我也試著在Heptabase裡先醞釀想法。可惜的是，我永遠都覺得自己的想法不夠完整。即使我看得懂自己在寫什麼，但我還是要考慮觀眾能不能理解。為此，我必須花大量時間整合Heptabase裡的多張卡片，接著濃縮內容寫成一篇文章。因為我認為外部的發表平台不方便讓讀者相互參照概念與概念之間的連繫。（如果他們想知道的話。）最終，距離我修完文章還是遙遙無期，其組織架構遠遠還沒到我認為可以對外分享的程度。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"86c113a1-2638-4378-a1ec-ed6edd5f35c1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"29cdf5ad-1539-474d-a471-d582d368f12d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相較而言，當我閱讀Jiang的數字花園，看著一篇篇示範的同時，我受到了很大的鼓舞：「原來這樣的形式，能夠讓外人快速看懂想法與想法之間交錯複雜的關係。」況且我對於Jiang擅長的領域並不熟悉，但我仍然看得津津有味。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62a2d7f9-ef1d-406d-9351-ed91811ee6c1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea0cc708-3d53-4d4b-91f7-2861da9cf498"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我從今年8月初建立了第一張卡片About，過程中也實驗了很久。一旦我忘記自己寫過什麼具體內容，我便把自己當成觀眾，然後一邊點擊網站觀賞創作，一邊注重自己閱讀時的感受。值得一提的是，數字花園讓我能直接站在讀者角度來檢視結果，那有助於我持續修改內容，而且補充其他概念也很容易；我不會一頭熱發布文章沒多久，就後悔到想下架。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"77be9034-a6fd-4af9-9030-15a53a9ec4f2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a12e9e85-8a4a-4234-8cb8-fd2a8073bcf3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"就在最近，我終於生出了一篇我認為別人看得懂的文章，還有令自己十分滿意的自我介紹。雖然目前我只分享Blog給身邊少數的朋友知道。（以前我只敢給自己看。）希望以後我能夠培養出更大的勇氣，將自己的數字花園分享給其他人知悉，而現在的我仍持續探索適合自己的創作方式。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"33354a74-43aa-4912-a9bc-775a954be270"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c93be4e8-52ee-4168-b7a1-a98c4b35da1c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以上的種種體驗對我意義重大，畢竟已經跨過了多年來難以跨越的門檻。雖然我在這裡回饋的文字量跟咖啡杯數不成正比，不過我真的很感謝Jiang願意開發這款數字花園。即便以後因為生活上的各種原因，導致Jiang沒有辦法持續維護它，我也很珍視使用這款數字花園的時光。（順帶一提，現在Heptabase中能正常顯示的圖片，在數字花園卻無法顯示，但這並不影響我在數字花園持續經營Blog！2023.11.26）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"746bbfb6-a7a9-45d5-bef4-2e7de3820381"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c81b9e2-c8df-4340-a8a9-05f2c74338b6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"祝Jiang生活順利😊"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"9573741f-aa47-4706-a97d-45e1745e242d"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"551f3ce7-52a8-4af4-93ac-ebf01b1e4448","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c6eacea4-03f2-43a6-8430-e4fa40efde22"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我思考良久，決定公開這段訊息，提供給想要"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.buymeacoffee.com/jiangzilong","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"為Jiang買咖啡"},{"type":"text","text":"的人參考！"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d495c116-d7ce-4931-b6d7-6afc9f257440","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97e8efb7-2b9c-4647-9f4c-b8c4b5e7f4bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"關於圖片無法顯示的問題，利用圖床就能暫時解決。（開發者馬上就為我解答了，實在非常感謝。）"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"207cf52e-0752-4fa4-a75e-56fd812b0672"}}]}
cards.title: 💭寫給Blog開發者的支持

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d5cc0635-a01b-4ac0-ab47-0e7d5161f4d9","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"地瓜的轉生歷程"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c0079052-1c10-4165-98f8-35c2ebb7b8a8","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"（一）烤炸的小地瓜"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9661c5fe-0314-4dea-8418-2f894d7dc79e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"父親在菜市場買了一整籃地瓜，尺寸有大有小。母親將半籃的地瓜送進烤箱，「叮！」一聲，烤盤上出現一顆炸開的迷你地瓜。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc43daba-566a-4b91-9e2f-7ed0bd208387"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8282914-59b0-4079-a37c-fa80d37964ec"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我翻轉360度觀察它，我認為很像一包抽取式濕紙巾。由於這顆地瓜長得實在是太特別了，於是我將照片發到IG限動，獲得朋友不錯的回響。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"b581dc43-28ba-4de2-be80-21319ffdcde5","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/20231126204035.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","originalHeight":1920,"originalWidth":1080,"alignment":"left"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"11625bdb-5d37-4129-af17-8e89baf3c0f8","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"（二）變身卡西法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9cea1763-eee1-4aa1-9f8b-82c1f6b4f0be"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其中一位朋友看完限動私訊我：「可以加工成卡西法（……？）」"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"02308ce5-a726-4c1c-8c94-d261d878211b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我原本忘了卡西法是誰。一查圖片我的眼睛瞪超大，不只是形狀，顏色也完全對上了！我後來找個時間幫它大致畫一下眼睛嘴巴。卡西法地瓜因而誕生！"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"7c15c38b-440b-4f85-908e-4ba0ff1a212c","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202401261720.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","originalHeight":4000,"originalWidth":2250,"alignment":"left"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3ce5b022-a579-4a0d-ae02-bedad9029c9c","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"（三）表情細修"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cef58d3b-1196-4448-ba0e-84201d6ed38d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我覺得自己繪製的表情比動畫還呆版。主要原因是物件之間的距離和尺寸過於相似，導致地瓜的臉平得像是一張紙。我仔細觀察動畫版卡西法，它眼睛的形狀不是正圓，尺寸還一大一小。彷彿火焰會隨著風吹搖曳。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f5416213-3207-47d3-9a58-3f84289bfcb3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1cde528-4aad-4bb9-98f0-f92a02cf60e5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"至於我繪製的嘴巴，其紅色有點鮮豔。這造成它與周遭環境無法融合。因此我有稍微調整嘴巴的彩度，並為其加上線條外框。好讓嘴巴與雙眼的風格統一。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d1618f24-186b-4b6c-a460-1c919ff224fc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8b51ab4-11eb-43d3-a20b-52f4076c0c5e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最後我移動卡西法地瓜的黑眼珠。讓它的視線與鏡頭背後的龐然大物互動。嗯，表情生動多了！"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"05aebea3-34ff-4e52-a782-e19ec15205e4","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202403080454804.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":600,"originalWidth":1200,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17ed5319-35f7-4d23-b18a-38e0a93e5ac7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5b94b447-8044-49c6-a4d0-babee4bfd573"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"雖然卡西法地瓜為了生存，所以事先在底下準備超大的木柴。但最後還是被我整個吃掉了。"}]}]}
cards.title: 地瓜的轉生歷程

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"de51ad49-83f7-4bdb-b37c-3764d3ce0220","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"創作目的"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73c8a0ca-ec99-4a4f-8b16-c941680bc21e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我不記得大多數寶可夢的名字，亦不清楚它們進化後的樣貌。（我小時候的節目舊稱為「神奇寶貝」，小智身旁是小遙。）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e59d68bc-44ae-4987-879f-4bd771a3e962"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"56b2b786-f545-4f2f-9cc5-ab3e1e486088"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"藉由與遊戲互動，它能夠達成我的核心目標：準時睡覺與起床。換言之，我希望長期接觸這款遊戲，而不會太快就感到無趣。所以我不會為了增加遊戲的攻略速度，而特地查詢相關資料，或是逼自己一定要多做些什麼，以獲得更多成長道具，我想要慢慢蒐集並培養這些寶可夢，幫它們取諧音只是增加過程中的遊玩樂趣。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3e6d16b-3b16-4579-bbc3-5a57e1dd439c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"78cff29d-d174-48ff-a9fb-80d619e9a250"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如此一來，我天天都期待與每一隻寶可夢相遇。"}]}]}
cards.title: 創作目的

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bf26d0d1-f0e1-489d-8754-606a0beae676","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"諧音爛梗發想"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a813d293-3973-4523-b95d-f5f424f3d07e","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"夥伴寶可夢"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f34abc9-818c-4cb1-8fb8-3bc5b168f20a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"它們已待在我的寶可夢盒中，相當於「收服」的狀態。"}]},{"type":"table","attrs":{"id":"0ac982c9-2dde-4b15-8fb8-15616673767a","hasRowHeader":true,"hasColumnHeader":false},"content":[{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"6b4d129e-3963-49ab-a3c6-6efd41bdf93b"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"e348546d-85bb-4f1c-aaad-dd10c4baa627","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[81.98860228491762],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bfe7ec24-79c6-4f80-bf41-17484523cea7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"圖鑑編號"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"b9ebbff0-6584-4fbf-b255-9d11e55c685d","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[120],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"529a054e-5d04-4fe6-848f-8c86dbdda8d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"諧音命名"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"be45e388-fc72-4248-98f5-37b46e865b90","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[210.09671357037496],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fca278b8-9286-4d22-942b-8ebbfbe2cd1b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所有發想（不管效果多爛都會保留）"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"2b781bbd-4502-438e-9937-419891c25a4d"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"9847e6d8-4ac7-4093-ac61-7f5d42374015","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[81.98860228491762],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2bcf67d7-fe4e-4292-9097-fbd3609c1573"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"No. 7"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"c6878766-e85d-42e3-a98d-f59753dc2e14","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[120],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"be44b4aa-46bb-40e9-b25c-852c255b0273"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"傑尼龜"},{"type":"text","text":"剛欸"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"3f26935f-1f4f-4ae9-b0d0-2d29a1dce77f","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[210.09671357037496],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"63c36c35-8781-4246-ae5a-e327027add06","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23e2bf52-eeb6-4ae4-87c7-bbd6d92d258d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"傑尼龜（歸）心似箭"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"181aed28-2a80-4a68-925e-36352c79723d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ca03201-eef0-4071-a848-8efaa2889b1d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"傑尼龜（歸）你莫屬"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4736c1fa-4665-4a83-892f-6da52cb6dcfe","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae1aa421-e9b2-44f6-a7b5-903477656cf4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"傑尼龜速行駛"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"7e205040-7bce-482d-bf33-1a8422f49676"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"90ac9cdd-22e1-436e-a64d-1232b2095c03","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[81.98860228491762],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a3913359-a8da-4212-9ea2-1baaeb7d68ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"No. 275d-9d36-45ef-a689-509886f5f655"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"f760f941-21a6-4753-9615-abbf1cfc0173","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[120],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d84786dd-550c-472c-83b1-4218654667c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"小拉達"},{"type":"text","text":"對了"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"5b8db9f5-33a1-4729-8cae-097cc3e562da","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[120],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"64cabdc6-a428-4412-be8f-a8c5e0a86092"}}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5781bfad-7ed6-4862-9226-b9c634ec72ba"}}]}
cards.title: 諧音爛梗發想

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"347a0714-5ff4-4852-9b89-e6e480923d3b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭法律的運作系統"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f94f5968-49ca-49c3-a55c-b2f07870b7d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法律的運作系統十分簡單，流程列於下方："}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"35e21256-3ece-4550-bd63-b6c0f290fff1","level":3},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b93fc655-7f7a-47bc-8a46-198131790a8f"}},{"type":"text","text":"➞"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6d75a2b7-9c1a-4b1a-9c4f-2c5b76631134"}}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"09fa0227-a8ee-4881-b35d-65ecf60f495a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d49e1e95-4cc9-4cf6-bf20-828dd2c31715"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"⚠️上述流程不可寫作「制定法律→執行法律」，基於"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e44b4e3e-5487-440b-8552-fcc0a3623ec8"}},{"type":"text","text":"。雖然日常生活中，大家會認為憲法是法律，但這裡最好精確使用「法規範」一詞。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9be11738-d1b2-4223-9302-afa21ed2e65e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2796ec7-d44f-45ac-a302-01ceb2d4f287"}}]}
cards.title: 💭法律的運作系統

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b457239c-c056-42e5-90d2-9e0651975bf5","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"憲法是法規範，不是法律"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"85b5901e-92d5-4eba-ba9c-4a33fa27f1aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法規範係指「規範社會生活的法則」，其指涉的範圍比法律還要大。我們之所以特意區分出「法規範」與「法律」兩者，是因為憲法為法規範，但不是法律。會這麼說有兩個理由："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75fe0143-6ea4-4235-ac16-32fbc21198f1"}},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5013bfab-5110-440d-841a-25764ec24d94","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ddfda257-a385-4670-b59f-3df3544e7a6f"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"憲法不符合「法律」之定義"},{"type":"text","text":"。受歷史因素影響，憲法本文當初由國民大會制定，所以該條文未經立法院通過。也就是說，憲法不符合本身條文所定義的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"197a1719-67b1-42ae-aa93-013e10317d7a"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"498f0100-fa8c-41bd-9482-785cf33043cf","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8c21bd1c-7fae-4256-b5c3-afa47dcc4181"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"用語不夠精準"},{"type":"text","text":"。法律的用語必須精確，為的是避免敘述模糊而引發爭議；相對而言，憲法的用詞卻十分抽象。雖然憲法提到了我們應保障的核心精神有哪些，可是不會告訴我們具體該怎麼做，才能實踐精神。講白了，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a5637745-ee38-4c3b-b73b-6d972ac13659"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab867cfd-1607-4ff4-8723-60ca5cbe3a5f"}}]}
cards.title: 憲法是法規範，不是法律

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c33e2318-6a12-4fe4-a7a9-15dae0265019","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法律"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a385279c-ce59-4b4c-89ba-58e573945084"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法律須"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"經立法院通過，後由總統公布"},{"type":"text","text":"。相關條文有："}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"a8ea9be7-c8bf-4530-bdb0-12ab2b8071b9"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"82a3b5a5-17ef-41a1-b3c1-137372302591"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawSingle.aspx?pcode=A0000001&flno=170","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"中華民國憲法第170條"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"text","text":"本憲法所稱之法律，謂經立法院通過，總統公布之法律。"}]}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"54df01f9-56b0-4173-a86d-28cc713a1f2b"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f0c30b92-cd24-4960-a44d-ab4f25ddc4c1"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawSingle.aspx?pcode=A0030133&flno=4","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"中央法規標準法第4條"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"text","text":"法律應經立法院通過，總統公布。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"052d0be1-3078-4005-bb55-67d8ef54c78c"}}]}
cards.title: 法律

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"965d843d-a82d-402f-b4d6-85868fb9a82a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"憲法是拿來看的"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1cc0c94-7e4f-49c6-9716-c880a129a586"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"要去讀法律條文，我們才能看出落實憲法精神的具體做法。"},{"type":"hard_break"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"59a96490-67ea-4203-91ef-69bf1a0caf82"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在一個法律充足的國家，憲法是拿來看，而不是拿來用。當我們必須跟法官講：我是依照憲法的規定來作請求的（請求權基礎），代表著該國家的立法是不足的、落後的，我們才需要拿憲法出來。相反來說，當立法是充足完整的，那一定有法讓我們用，不需要拿憲法出來。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a62b4bb9-4164-4f7d-83f6-b0eeab9affef"}}]}
cards.title: 憲法是拿來看的

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e62868c2-dfb7-4e36-a91d-0ac24fee0d69","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"制定法規範"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"670c5cf2-7d31-4c50-8275-256a34e5ebf0","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法規範的類型"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1d9233fc-924a-427d-8f40-33ad0079d135"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"制定法規範法規範有三大類型，分別是憲法、中央法規與地方法規。首先，憲法是是國家根本大法，有其特殊性，所以類型上會將憲法獨立開來，而後者中央與地方的區別在於適用範圍不同。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"003c78f6-a51a-48d2-810d-2b803fdfb9d0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d2af7909-5275-4752-97ce-ff73c4221ec7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"接著，倘若我們將三大類型更細分，則最終呈現的結構為："}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6a6865dd-2fe8-49d0-8e3d-43b993255f82","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"憲法"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6dea028c-72d6-4a6d-8748-e8a776897f33","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b834810a-0241-49af-be44-ba1a1765e33a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"憲法本文"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fa6ba3ba-dc3b-4e2c-90d4-6ec4d77b7816","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4318caa8-e963-4243-9eea-be08aab906f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"憲法增修條文"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f38e5eac-9246-4d9b-acfe-d47c01ba34d8","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"中央法規"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b1046c62-3c9c-4d24-aec3-9b816fe2d600","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"078671a6-c479-47b2-ab2d-58e54dd2a4e3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法律"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"92746465-52a4-4df6-ba7d-bec251326f97","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dc8342c1-59b8-49c6-8808-07b98f51136e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"命令"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7c7c86b0-d35b-4e5d-8456-3113b569b90b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62888a99-fb29-4b66-b9ee-190f75df9baa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法規命令"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bf31b1b2-83c9-41f0-990f-d209d1be2c9e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c76f2873-2b20-43eb-8537-f863720a7100"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政規則"}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9e4006b9-6e42-447a-a0b2-96c32088766a","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"地方法規"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a7aa5e7d-4a32-4ed5-8eac-4e630f081726","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c07f50e-39db-40ed-8f10-8cb1dd81a1e6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自治條例"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2c7d2edd-0a4f-4405-a3c3-cf6d32a37ee1","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f14107a5-1281-40d2-a84d-28646ec253f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自治規則"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9eb57885-2e48-4dea-855f-ff04461c2264"}}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5b464902-6261-475b-887f-173fda3c2dae","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭法規範的位階"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"715a735e-ede6-4c97-9fc4-cf0023d093e4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法規範位階由上到下："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"baab46b5-a1c3-47bc-9015-866bd3526263"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"憲法＞法律＞法規命令＞行政規則＞自治條例＞自治規則"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0e50a759-ae3f-46d4-a21b-4a6f927dd5c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"某事項應以何種法規範規定，取決於"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"該事項對人民的重要性"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"789fdc26-7659-46d9-9487-c713f4fd70ee"}}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c24a0a07-2b28-4bd4-bac2-368ff211c0e4","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭引言結尾用語"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c40cc3d4-7ecb-4fa8-b190-954f950582b5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23e64493-ab73-4ed5-b4ef-dc95e4ce3a7c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"……。其具體措施如下："}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"82f59883-0d12-4dff-9d8d-dc4c8107b067","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17850e73-51e9-4a29-aba3-7bcc410085aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以下就此分數述："}]}]}]}
cards.title: 💭引言結尾用語

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4b7660e9-457e-4230-93c2-793c3899b7fd","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭免職與撤銷任用"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3680b9df-4b40-4436-8b31-21587d5b2b2a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"身分處置最核心探討核心分為免職與撤銷任用，前者是到職後發生，後者是到職前已發生。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b8e04915-2130-45ca-8682-90e64410b11f","level":3},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c840b5eb-8cdd-4a01-be36-571a95fa2213"}}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"32b2aec0-9315-493d-9320-b46207bd8272","level":3},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"14aca177-9364-46bf-b458-dad3f0192d9b"}}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3c910a28-b6a8-46f6-b9eb-18f9b635464f","level":3},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"53a09863-7562-4feb-b6c0-02c18ab5f591"}}]}]}
cards.title: 💭免職與撤銷任用

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f86025a8-7ba1-44ca-8be5-c9932d80fb9f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公務人員任用法第28條第1項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92b8ab2d-fdb0-4711-8743-de2ddebfb83b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有下列情事之一者，不得任用為公務人員："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38c30f10-6477-4659-ae25-2a22347a704c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一、未具或喪失中華民國國籍。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6c35cf47-715a-4cbb-9146-ea03deb8f8a2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"二、具中華民國國籍兼具外國國籍。但本法或其他法律另有規定者，不在此限。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"30c56413-e6db-4f76-b6a3-f996635a5ee3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"三、動員戡亂時期終止後，曾犯內亂罪、外患罪，經有罪判決確定或通緝有案尚未結案。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d0f0f411-49c8-49ca-ab64-1fe9172b4db2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"四、曾服公務有貪污行為，經有罪判決確定或通緝有案尚未結案。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4383408c-8189-40c1-afd6-e8be0d9b6cd7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"五、犯前二款以外之罪，判處有期徒刑以上之刑確定，尚未執行或執行未畢。但受緩刑宣告者，不在此限。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc056ea2-857d-4368-b1ff-d08781e70455"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"六、曾受免除職務懲戒處分。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c42494d-3088-4f1c-8848-2b7d0c3371d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"七、依法停止任用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ff31f00-4f30-418b-911f-b1b1f28b3130"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"八、褫奪公權尚未復權。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b450e04-23e3-4b43-8203-2bb7161478c0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"九、經原住民族特種考試及格，而未具或喪失原住民身分。但具有其他考試及格資格者，得以該考試及格資格任用之。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1fc25fef-eb69-4dd8-b419-416fa3d6a8c7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"十、依其他法律規定不得任用為公務人員。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"14c0b0e0-ee57-4201-b945-a0747cb201c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"十一、受監護或輔助宣告，尚未撤銷。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"19ca1a1e-942b-464b-8610-97d397eafc25"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e55e6e86-9a31-404e-9cf0-44d3cbb18d8d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"571d2e9b-c99b-4ded-af09-fe7e3fbaa5d4"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2784d314-51b4-4e46-9e01-ce03b9c0b624"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"33149844-9e99-4d8c-8fc1-2fa6eefb6703","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"50cc4df5-9b88-4057-8eb3-38398f814549"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"看到第7款要想到"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a4e8737d-c962-40d4-b2dd-1a3d5efb02d1"}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 公務人員任用法第28條第1項

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f3ff6497-2278-4dff-bec6-b9b032d14707","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭將第1款至第11款分類"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bb41d228-eb75-4b76-a745-f29fe1fbdb5f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第1款至第11款相當多，一遍看過去仍難以記憶。因此我們按照款的順序，將11款簡化成5大類（4+其他），分別有國籍、刑事責任、行政責任、其他、民事責任。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f3359a24-6155-44e6-9473-e5b0e323ac0c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"632b01b6-4f75-4ad3-be1c-cd0d3698a46c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一方面，款的先後排序可看出價值的輕重區分。比較嚴重的列在前面。因此刑事責任（犯罪）＞行政責任（懲戒）＞民事責任（受監護、輔助宣告不是當事人的錯）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b436efe5-da01-4110-8e4a-057a47bf5996"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b667aab7-7b8e-4148-b083-602fc02e91b9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"細看刑事責任的部分，立法者認為貪污比殺人嚴重。"}]},{"type":"toggle_list_item","attrs":{"id":"49b9e6fd-d432-4127-81f9-9ba7f47c2ed6","folded":true},"content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"49dcb37a-e826-4a06-a40d-d65b8e1d8001","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"國籍"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e803fc71-dfcb-437b-99ef-c80f3bb3582a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d13a4df-dfb9-4023-b407-fc21564c78bc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一、未具或喪失中華民國國籍。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"14de862c-bcfc-4923-a929-a2508b5d758b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a40460a-400f-4955-ac93-92b1b7faf510"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"二、具中華民國國籍兼具外國國籍。但本法或其他法律另有規定者，不在此限。"}]}]}]},{"type":"toggle_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a853c582-b169-4317-8fb9-4dbdc55b1c15","folded":true},"content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0a2f1f48-2ce2-4465-8ac0-b273e2a9fb41","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"刑事責任（犯罪）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"64a09c9c-869b-40cb-9d48-a7d66043a8a6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7c9bc7b-9374-4241-8baf-500ca12bc94b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"三、動員戡亂時期終止後，曾犯內亂罪、外患罪，經有罪判決確定或通緝有案尚未結案。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"85d2af35-fa67-4f0a-a188-0c32259e3517","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0fcf26bb-c458-4b35-8de8-f5e162214753"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"四、曾服公務有貪污行為，經有罪判決確定或通緝有案尚未結案。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c6db4138-c2e8-444a-b61a-cdfdda8ed4ff","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"823abf8e-0e51-4fe0-bb74-79040b7c1a1c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"五、犯前二款以外之罪，判處有期徒刑以上之刑確定，尚未執行或執行未畢。但受緩刑宣告者，不在此限。"}]}]}]},{"type":"toggle_list_item","attrs":{"id":"07d2c017-5f7a-406d-b253-86bbff77752b","folded":true},"content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bef01995-f320-44ae-b816-5c5c410ddd85","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政責任（懲戒）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"30ceaddc-e6ff-43ac-9dff-af6c72e16d54","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f40a50c-814b-463b-b2c2-9cb1da40046a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"六、曾受免除職務懲戒處分。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2c3de3a4-f12f-40b2-b0f3-b7391aad6d65","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae881f49-5378-4a08-a661-9915395f1c60"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"七、依法停止任用。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"→撤職"}]}]}]},{"type":"toggle_list_item","attrs":{"id":"09f1ee01-17c3-4cd3-8118-27fa6900b09f","folded":true},"content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b24dc9a2-e60f-48f8-adbf-43c04f583924","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其他（難以分類）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d3d95a0d-1fed-45f9-8172-56f88e94f15a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4bbd08d4-7f57-42ec-9795-c3493ee59a5d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"八、褫奪公權尚未復權。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"→褫奪公權：不能行使公民權利"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5b5110ea-3487-4b10-bc54-23b88ea1b578","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf779193-1eea-473a-ae32-07c2953a3234"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"九、經原住民族特種考試及格，而未具或喪失原住民身分。但具有其他考試及格資格者，得以該考試及格資格任用之。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"→特殊情形，法條中的「其他考試」例如高普考"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"133b5dd0-b206-4c8f-9f02-bde99fa705fb","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d01105e6-2d43-4f88-84d5-f0a26a36b1e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"十、依其他法律規定不得任用為公務人員。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"→其他條件"}]}]}]},{"type":"toggle_list_item","attrs":{"id":"65891f4d-c823-4e3c-9d26-4732fc8c7eaa","folded":true},"content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b5dd0ca9-cc6d-48c9-83ef-758e394b9bc0","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"民事責任"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"834382dc-3165-4b87-85ae-81ad48e7a89e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0b359641-fcfc-409b-9100-f964d9001e59"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"十一、受監護或輔助宣告，尚未撤銷。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"→民法中的監護與輔助宣告"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9428e62a-1b60-49f4-bbd6-f5d7d0eae827"}}]}
cards.title: 💭將第1款至第11款分類

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"17f8d389-9b90-4c81-94b0-2b8ce38e4d8c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公務人員懲戒法第12條"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"09355acd-1523-480f-a66c-d591a45e9350"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第1項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2a6bf09-6e4e-49c7-966f-74b2047c6e32"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"撤職，撤其現職，並於一定期間停止任用；其期間為一年以上、五年以下。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab1089b1-bea6-4be3-833b-a44c23a8fc15"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4e7aa931-a9ca-4fb7-a99c-294ac4ad6e3a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第2項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"923e29ce-ad2e-49e6-92cc-5c0792768eb5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前項撤職人員，於停止任用期間屆滿，再任公務員者，自再任之日起，二年內不得晉敘、陞任或遷調主管職務。"}]}]}
cards.title: 公務人員懲戒法第12條

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c1072f2d-19ee-4f20-a611-9b5bcc2347f2","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公務人員懲戒法第12條第1項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"43fc2808-5627-4f0f-9b1c-635eb2481009"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"撤職，撤其現職，並於一定期間停止任用；其期間為一年以上、五年以下。"}]}]}
cards.title: 公務人員懲戒法第12條第1項

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1bb0f83f-d50a-4610-a9a1-c6e60bb8ff0e","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公務人員懲戒法第12條第2項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"45ca39de-a4bb-4850-94b7-dca456a76014"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/d30784ba-63e0-476c-a897-27df361348bb","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"前項"},{"type":"text","text":"撤職人員，於停止任用期間屆滿，再任公務員者，自再任之日起，二年內不得晉敘、陞任或遷調主管職務。"}]}]}
cards.title: 公務人員懲戒法第12條第2項

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b960c486-8da1-4ca9-b3a3-b742304c4cad","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"立法者形成的自由空間"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f92db80d-dba4-4adc-994e-39e2e0216563"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我們覺得事情重要，就重要了，除非以後再修正。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"71cbebd5-13e7-4e31-846e-46a4ce4f2cc2"}}]}
cards.title: 立法者形成的自由空間

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d4e05065-c374-432f-a520-6d8a94631374","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公務人員任用法第28條第5項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a3d58c48-e427-4112-afc0-2a8c3933af62"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/7301f98c-3282-4519-9ef1-47b8fffb2867","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"前項"},{"type":"text","text":"人員任職期間之職務行為，不失其效力；業已依規定支付之俸給及其他給付，不予追還。但經依第一項第二款情事撤銷任用者，應予追還。"}]}]}
cards.title: 公務人員任用法第28條第5項

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ed8ba938-7446-43cc-ba90-afe6139c9737","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公務人員任用法第28條第4項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7ff272e-b067-4db3-bc87-2824f35e78b5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公務人員於任用後，有第一項第一款至第十款情事之一，或於任用時，有第一項第二款情事，業依國籍法第二十條第四項規定於到職前辦理放棄外國國籍，而未於到職之日起一年內完成喪失該國國籍及取得證明文件，且無第二項情形者，應予免職；有第十一款情事者，應依規定辦理退休或資遣。任用後發現其於任用時有第一項各款情事之一者，應撤銷任用。"}]}]}
cards.title: 公務人員任用法第28條第4項

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9623b5e8-a2f7-4cc8-8dff-c2680bdcc94e","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公務人員任用法第28條第2項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a3570d46-288a-45ac-98e6-d46ffe990bcb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前項第二款具中華民國國籍兼具外國國籍者，無法完成喪失外國國籍及取得證明文件，係因該外國國家法令致不得放棄國籍，且已於到職前依規定辦理放棄外國國籍，並出具書面佐證文件經外交部查證屬實，仍得任用為公務人員，並以擔任不涉及國家安全或國家機密之機關及職務為限。"}]}]}
cards.title: 公務人員任用法第28條第2項

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9cb37cd9-2c01-4422-a3ef-bfa2b9ab2301","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"部分職務可以有雙重國籍"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"028014e5-d183-4c69-874d-755a451cedf7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"國外有些國家不讓人民放棄國籍。根據"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"148e7d04-0784-4b9f-850a-db5a58135ded"}},{"type":"text","text":"，雙重國籍的人仍有機會擔任公務人員，只是工作內容不得涉及國家安全或國家機密。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"10fba461-a06a-435c-a282-05244f979dd1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"09556976-fd7e-46f0-bd50-8f007109cc91"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要注意的是，該公務人員於到職前還是要向外國辦理放棄國籍手續，並出示「我已經辦理過」的佐證文件。（即便辦理前就已經知道會失敗）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"15becfe2-e89b-4039-a78f-f6101adb3fed"}},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"5fbb6f88-01d0-492a-a106-c30d8cd8bac8"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6dba04bb-480d-46bd-a1e1-d899d53d0b5e"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/148e7d04-0784-4b9f-850a-db5a58135ded","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"公務人員任用法第28條第2項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a863454a-a181-45cc-9178-293ed48f2272"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前項第二款具中華民國國籍兼具外國國籍者，無法完成喪失外國國籍及取得證明文件，係因該外國國家法令致不得放棄國籍，且已於到職前依規定辦理放棄外國國籍，並出具書面佐證文件經外交部查證屬實，仍得任用為公務人員，並以擔任不涉及國家安全或國家機密之機關及職務為限。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 部分職務可以有雙重國籍

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"27023f0f-06f0-4f02-b629-f5acf62fcb93","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"免職"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"987954d2-ec0f-4f92-a843-c6a656f19e27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"機關任用某公務人員之後（任用後），發生"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7301f98c-3282-4519-9ef1-47b8fffb2867"}},{"type":"text","text":"所提到之情事，則該人不得繼續擔任公務人員，應予「免職」。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"664f132b-0370-42e6-b9d5-316f8b51cdbe"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0b1f93db-d5e8-4f30-a8fa-24097e4e7413"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7301f98c-3282-4519-9ef1-47b8fffb2867"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff687482-7b42-49e8-963c-423d3bf85b2b"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"公務人員於任用後，有第一項第一款至第十款情事之一，或於任用時，有第一項第二款情事，業依國籍法第二十條第四項規定於到職前辦理放棄外國國籍，而未於到職之日起一年內完成喪失該國國籍及取得證明文件，且無第二項情形者，應予免職"},{"type":"text","text":"；有第十一款情事者，應依規定辦理退休或資遣。任用後發現其於任用時有第一項各款情事之一者，應撤銷任用。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"588455ab-d931-44d5-a223-b4b6ca3c86b8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b841a271-7bf8-4975-b28e-2d5ef9f3e1b0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"整理以上高亮處的敘述，有2種情形應予免職："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b030dc02-96c5-463e-b575-c8ff180d0b60","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7403c76-d16f-4745-bce2-804587689e48"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e21a02e1-8685-4734-8e47-891c45bf3688"}},{"type":"text","text":"第一款至第十款情事之一"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e2bb2644-617e-4fed-acd0-ff95a8a1e16e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12c8d730-8890-456a-aefe-fb295e044c2b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"某公務人員具雙重國籍，雖然到職前已辦理放棄外國國籍，但到職之日起一年內外國國籍沒有喪失。⚠️不用免職的例外："},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"cf5e6d04-aec6-45b5-9d2b-08e93c9212ac"}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 免職

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"460e5255-e7b0-485c-82d0-4086b6441acb","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"撤銷任用"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"3a19305f-80b5-408e-936c-e34222195d14"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fe01a19c-abfe-4d11-97da-6f8825e0b3c8"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7301f98c-3282-4519-9ef1-47b8fffb2867"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f03e20a-343f-4265-8684-4f1729dc2dc1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公務人員於任用後，有第一項第一款至第十款情事之一，或於任用時，有第一項第二款情事，業依國籍法第二十條第四項規定於到職前辦理放棄外國國籍，而未於到職之日起一年內完成喪失該國國籍及取得證明文件，且無第二項情形者，應予免職；有第十一款情事者，應依規定辦理退休或資遣。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"任用後發現其於任用時有第一項各款情事之一者，應撤銷任用。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 撤銷任用

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"01c5902e-0fcd-48b6-91b5-32f561750914","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"退休資遣"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"7987d8a3-bc0f-4fef-b138-3b6f0bdc6a40"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c291896a-1b3e-439d-9047-7b825641e2f6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7301f98c-3282-4519-9ef1-47b8fffb2867"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5220a698-d178-4587-bd08-b7902d168c5c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公務人員於任用後，有第一項第一款至第十款情事之一，或於任用時，有第一項第二款情事，業依國籍法第二十條第四項規定於到職前辦理放棄外國國籍，而未於到職之日起一年內完成喪失該國國籍及取得證明文件，且無第二項情形者，應予免職；"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"有第十一款情事者，應依規定辦理退休或資遣。"},{"type":"text","text":"任用後發現其於任用時有第一項各款情事之一者，應撤銷任用。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"02aa2804-488c-4c4d-a1f3-01c830a07d05"}}]}
cards.title: 退休資遣

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"789340fa-ffd4-4138-8b22-54523266d1ee","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭Heptabase功能許願"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba371110-3ae0-45b1-a11c-35fb606c8289"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分隔線以下的訊息，是我向開發團隊許願Journal的新功能。由於我將自己的使用過程寫得鉅細靡遺，所以想說不如整段放上來，之後如果有問題的解法，我可以再更新。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d86e575-e567-46ce-9b88-9b83234aaf41"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bd8ff2f0-4945-472d-84a5-c6e6cc5501c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"截至2024年1月27日，Heptabase的人員向我表示目前用戶訊息正在塞車（我非常能理解ww），之後會找我訪談以詢問更多細節，討論看看問題有沒有解決方式。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81edc307-dcfb-40c3-8a8f-a7c388ffd082"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a14582a7-5725-442c-af85-c362a6db5201"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"⚠️非Heptabase的使用者可能會看不懂。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3d295028-a6d7-49f2-9cec-33f11a037ef8"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"💡下述問題已找到「可能的」解決方式（見文章底部）。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"23770e58-b58d-4edc-bcd3-b3375b64322d"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"29a7be23-1607-43c2-9fdb-293834938491","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我的許願訊息"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bdd85a27-714c-4b5b-8775-6763a41f5c5c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你好，我想詢問：Journal卡片有無可能再細拆成「更多張同日期的Journal卡片」？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a48dcc2-859a-426f-85c1-acb45a12dedc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1d692b33-8866-4acd-ae44-228439eb452b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"比起創建白板學習特定主題，我更常在Journal書寫內容。我使用Heptabase大約1年多，一開始我建立了幾個白板，計劃深入學習特定主題，不過後來因為生活比較忙，導致自己預計要學習的主題必須暫緩，也沒辦法仔細整理之前學習的內容，因此當時Journal功能推出之後，我便將所有的發現跟心情都記錄在Journal，Map反而很少使用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c3de954d-0690-480c-9c30-4631fb713ad8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d25fa2ef-a8fb-4023-aed1-48d8ccb01dbe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一張Journal卡片，我經常記錄了兩件以上的事情（最高紀錄是一天七件事，我寫了快3000字），但事件彼此之間完全沒有關聯。比如我早上寫了某支YT影片的觀後感，晚上則記錄購買某件商品之前的思考過程。當我連續紀錄了幾個月，我發現自己不斷在Journal紀錄瑣碎的事情，即便當初只寫了一兩行字，長久來看卻產生了自己以往沒有打算關注的主題。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a2836020-e124-4180-a205-8a5b2a8b5722"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec31411b-fc41-4e9b-afe0-c51c22f2db12"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我認為Journal與自己的生活有強烈的連結，或許經過整理能發展出具有說服力的文章。於是我開始在想：「不然開個白板來統整相關的內容。」"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c3036b4c-c8b1-4e2f-8273-5a9e239f9afc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"53605af6-f633-4447-a1b2-5510199bf29c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"就在我想要統整的時候，產生了不方便：同一天的Journal卡片有其他不相關的事情。當我將一張Journal卡片移至新創建的白板中，我還是得過濾掉其他不相關的事件，畢竟那天我記錄了七件事。我想到的方法就是手動將相關事情複製貼上到新的卡片，並用Heading載明當時的日期，這樣我第一眼就能看到。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de09472c-fae9-4945-a07d-9e0625a3ec94"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aad0047a-d02f-48c6-bb81-04ba1d2ee193"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我會希望事件拆分後仍舊保留Journal的日期，是因為日期有助於我理解當時的心境，也易於我後續整理文章的時間線。舉個例子，我的穿搭試錯經驗。明明我覺得穿某件衣服應該會很好看，但實際穿上後就覺得效果差一點，可能是顏色太多，或是材質不適合，接著我拍下當天的穿搭照片，貼在Journal上。當時我覺得那段紀錄可有可無，但時間一拉長才發現Journal上都是我珍貴的試錯經驗，蒐集起來往後當反面教材也很不錯。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e824bcd4-5f7a-442d-8ca8-53c107daa347"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b65bd99d-4643-43ad-b749-9ed91e4a36b8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"綜上所述，我想請求的功能是：Journal卡片細拆成更多張同一天的Journal卡片。不過倘若已經有替代功能，還是正在開發類似功能我沒注意到消息，又或者我提出的功能不適合Heptabase整體運作，我也期待開發者分享相關看法，謝謝！"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"a2cd8619-84b8-4ba8-bfa1-de77cd8c5427"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c626d599-d7d3-4812-ac24-dab3172e5986","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可能的解決方式💡"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6b98c5d7-a961-4a0a-9b2c-b0ef8e19283d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我最近才注意到"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://wiki.heptabase.com/tags-and-kanban?lang=zh-Hant","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Tag’s Table & Kanban的功能"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3850a999-1896-4355-ac6f-7523d7a8a183"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de18ad33-a76b-455f-b2b6-d3727e9763f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"過去我都沒在使用Tag，也沒有關注其功能的更新。由於我以前不斷更換筆記軟體，造成卡片的數量始終堆不起來。所以我一直覺得不需要用到Tag來管理自己的筆記。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d6f8b0ac-f4ab-4298-9630-36a5697bd0f5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"53962258-508e-4000-8626-691e735068cd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"然而，現在我認為該功能應該可以解決上述困擾。不過我想要自行測試一陣子。當我覺得它確實解決了自己的問題，我再回頭調整這篇內容。另外，如果以後有機會，我也想分享自己的使用經驗。👉"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/ae585fa6-2a0c-4874-ad9b-8e59aa5b645c","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"預計的測試方向"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5a7194f6-1207-4ff7-bd89-8b0e8a88d01d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fffa2c6d-31e0-4999-bcf9-aadca8b0e81a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目前我也已經通知Heptabase的人員，可以取消未來與我的訪談。我希望他們的服務能夠讓給其他更有需要的人。（2024.03.10更新）"}]}]}
cards.title: 💭Heptabase功能許願

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"53311a2f-12f6-4e03-ad1a-7d6fd5567003","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🌾卡西法地瓜"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"3779f5d7-5c13-4b18-ab80-4211ceb54c1a","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202401280544.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","originalHeight":2480,"originalWidth":1754,"alignment":"left"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b7ea7948-e7c3-4315-99cf-9ee6c30f2b0e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"電影"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zh.wikipedia.org/zh-tw/%E5%93%88%E5%B0%94%E7%9A%84%E7%A7%BB%E5%8A%A8%E5%9F%8E%E5%A0%A1","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"《霍爾的移動城堡》"},{"type":"text","text":"中，有隻名為卡西法的火惡魔。某天它出現在我家的烤盤上。拍完照之後，它便成為我身體的動力來源。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"16b65380-788d-42c4-9e17-4c5e2314e1c3"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"490ee8a3-0fa1-4bdc-bc01-5060ee37d4cd","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"了解更多"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d9466a5a-ad36-4198-998f-46a011336212","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f424d50a-4026-4c40-aab9-3ee9feac0bb6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ddf15dfb-f09f-4051-99a6-a7a72bc58bed"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c024f7f6-827d-432c-aec3-98e67718583b"}}]}
cards.title: 🌾卡西法地瓜

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3ced5d7c-853c-466f-8834-53c661777f35","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主題簡介"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"35f10a8f-1775-4bfb-8da9-48d3ff854d23","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"產品使用記錄"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a9b68b19-16e1-45f7-878d-f19bc1565e34"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目前寫了許多回饋給不同的工具開發者。我都會盡可能將內容寫得鉅細靡遺，因為我喜歡在生活中持續使用他們的產品。書寫時偶爾會擔心自己對產品的了解是否太少，幸好至今為止與開發者交流的經驗都很不賴！"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"505b7368-943d-489d-a28c-2ec05f3c2efb"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"52b9e5e8-7469-4177-975c-1d162617d9cd","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其他"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1564f42f-8093-48eb-87ab-a57ea8a8dfac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"哇哩，我還不知道怎麼歸類。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1799eeb9-9411-49ff-a888-d3d806ce8577"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f703b4fb-fa71-46e6-b4d5-3b1d50568da8"}}]}
cards.title: 主題簡介

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0b7f39e5-d756-478e-9975-86c1f76dc5b6","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主題說明：大學回顧"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"adcda9d2-8c11-4b1b-90ad-49f5674b396c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2023年7月，我從臺灣藝術大學畢業。我度過了非常瘋狂的4年，特別是最後一年的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/83920266-fc10-45bd-ab83-ec75017fedba","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"畢業製作"},{"type":"text","text":"，成果超乎我的預期，想當初團隊的每個成員都絕望到看不見終點ww"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8d94e035-ec42-4d6b-9051-b6e75224b7ff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大學四年的經歷，讓我對於「自身成長」與「團隊合作」方面有一些心得，亦產生了新的人生目標想要嘗試。整頓好心情之後，我決定開啟該主題，陸續撰寫回顧。"}]}]}
cards.title: 主題說明：大學回顧

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ff8542cb-de46-4b6c-82d9-b1431e292601","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主題說明：形色大觀園"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"41d29854-f580-4af8-808f-e530ca3dc846"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我經常在生活中發現有趣的形狀或色彩分布，一看到就會有衝動想要拍下來。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b1a9fac-c51c-4aa0-8006-2832719656e5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"616e988f-0104-441c-874a-ac4598c42fa1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"手機裡保存了超級多張照片，一開始我拍攝的理由是：「哪天創作需要發想時，再拿它們的造形當作參考。」但實際上我很少能花大把時間實驗畫布。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"243452b9-c8ab-46c8-8ef7-5d79d0b8301b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"90dc9434-f136-4119-8a09-962075576e1a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"總覺得照片就這樣沉睡在手機裡很可惜，於是我開始在網路上分享自己看到了什麼，拍完就上傳。久而久之，我對於「利用零碎時間就能腦洞大開」這點感到很滿足，而照片主角不經意就會從我的身邊蹦出來，也為日常增添不少樂趣。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5756b7b5-df72-4803-a995-3c36e0a7e264"}}]}
cards.title: 主題說明：形色大觀園
