cards.title: 詢問數字花園開發者

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a7b53488-5a71-45b8-909a-a6dd5ab16430","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🌾Chrome分頁裁切標誌"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"69f00676-cb0b-4824-94bd-1e5dc2152cb2","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"問題發現"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58990601-3e15-4d09-8f4f-9f139c760a74"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2024年1月底我收到開發者的消息，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://notes.dabing.one/post?note-id=b81a2f54-ec5b-4de0-9e97-ab841c0e18f9","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"數字花園"},{"type":"text","text":"支持自訂義網站小圖示（Favicon）。當我將檔案放上github，接著"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"從Google Chrome觀看自己的網站時，便發現了一個問題：標誌被裁切，破壞了整體形狀。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"596f0029-e9b4-4e07-8875-711754949811","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202401311121454.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":68,"originalWidth":816,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1f049aa1-f3d8-408e-93fd-1ba2149161f4"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f065abb9-541d-42bb-91aa-09834b011103"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我多開幾個分頁測試。首先，開第一個分頁只會切到標誌下方，但只要開第二個以上的分頁，標誌右側就有機率也被切到，我看其他網站的Favicon也會發生。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"891bdd7b-e622-4595-ba2f-652861f936e3","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202402080335100.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"100%","originalHeight":68,"originalWidth":816,"alignment":"left"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ba94408-fafe-4af7-b121-8998431b6744"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"636c613c-2b69-46ec-8cfb-71c780d18ab4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一方面，如果將瀏覽器換成Microsoft Edge，則標誌的輪廓就是完整的，不會裁切。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"7272b122-c2d2-482b-b545-eedf4b93d252","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202401311206886.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","originalHeight":55,"originalWidth":410,"alignment":"left"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7fac9281-0efd-4073-aaac-eeeae5f2abdd"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2774f86f-b79b-48e4-846c-85cdcb91cd65"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我試著在網路上搜尋看看Chrome官方資料有沒有提到。或是其他人是否也有相同困擾。可是我沒找到答案。因此我回頭測試我的檔案，將檔案存成各種尺寸，再看看分頁顯示有沒有變化。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5927d3e7-6dc1-4ced-a06e-50939b9069cf"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce9b70c9-e483-44a9-bcb4-67cb854ea851"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外，我也看過自己筆電的Chrome分頁，標誌反而沒有被切到。這不禁使我懷疑：「問題難道是因為桌機螢幕較大造成的？」（然而我沒有更多證據。）"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"e5672a5b-7168-4383-82cd-523087a0d0fd"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"50c04ac5-0b5f-4367-8a52-273cf3d70e88","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我的解法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da96dd84-4676-4dd1-b42d-ef9bd97eb169"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我希望在每個裝置顯示時，標誌都不會被切到。而我觀察到某些網頁的Favicon特別小，並且形狀很完整沒有被裁切。經過我的測量，它們的尺寸大致縮減了兩成。於是我"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"將標誌等比例縮小至80%"},{"type":"text","text":"，畫布尺寸則維持不變。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"407ecef7-7c81-44a2-8773-8bd7767961c4","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202402080124614.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":836,"originalWidth":1399,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d7adc02-a62c-426b-8e5e-94800f0dd54a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea0f251c-55ec-4a1b-9cf0-4d845428400c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"也就是說，如果製作檔案時，像左邊修改前把標誌塞滿整個畫布。那麼不論畫布邊長設成多少px，分頁都會自動把標誌縮放成固定尺寸。那麼標誌就一定會被切到；不如像右邊修改後一樣，保留畫布四邊的透明背景。因為網頁會將四邊空白處也辨識為標誌的一部分。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ef39eec-44cb-46e7-9896-965247945174"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"85efd253-3a7b-4ac1-bb28-db59ec264e95"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"終於成功了！當我將標誌縮小後，Chrome分頁就不會裁切到標誌形狀。不過需要注意的是：修改後的標誌會看起來比原本更小。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"552e89cd-47d8-4937-80b2-ce23291a8040","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202402080420403.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":68,"originalWidth":717,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f4525b0-7aab-4de7-97f8-f8891e0574be"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b980c61a-bdca-4c56-bd4d-2eef6cb6c796"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"倘若介意標誌縮小後看不清楚。那我的方法就不是很好，要斟酌一下。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"d372811a-0354-49da-a7a9-ffdd9a085b68"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"380bfe49-0b48-4218-9906-05de5aaa6326","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"favicon.ico"},{"type":"text","text":"最終格式"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8f6a154e-4805-4e4b-ac81-dd9c5552cd7c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d4430c94-f03b-4f09-aed0-caab144e34eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"檔案類型：ico"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"45d1f182-8cb8-474b-9114-ac2c853c3604","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"32a11237-8308-4f64-8064-a5ff8476760a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"尺寸*"},{"type":"text","text":"：144×144(px)"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"44d25096-809c-442e-bb8e-206ea6904b35","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7f7cc35-ad18-4385-8415-1c049ba96afe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"解析度：72ppi"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e7b7fa93-d2ff-49b9-b09b-d02010c6afe5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf20be66-5eea-40b8-af55-5494566aa573"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"背景顏色：透明（png轉ico）"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0634dffc-4367-4b82-813b-f4c586d9a5f8","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尺寸備註"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"31961dc2-cf51-42ea-a912-e55da277e21d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"標誌照著數字花園的原檔尺寸存沒問題（128×128px），不一定要跟我一樣存成144×144(px)。只是我剛開始以為裁切問題之所以會發生，是因為我的畫布沒有存成"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://developers.google.com/search/docs/appearance/favicon-in-search?hl=zh-tw","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Google建議的尺寸"},{"type":"text","text":"，也就是48px的倍數。所以我後來就固定將畫布邊長設定成144px。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21e93f5e-3a59-47d9-b902-36cc47bea837"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"83df0c1e-bb9d-456e-adf8-9791fd842511"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"存成邊長更小的96px大概也沒事。檔案變小了，圖片加載速度應該更快。只要檔案上傳後，確定標誌看起來不會糊就好。然而我本身對UI領域不熟悉。再加上我未來還想修改自己的標誌，所以畫布尺寸的調整之後再說。目前就不特別花時間測試了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5fe6acd4-c98a-435f-8b3b-5b243eef3e73"}}]}
cards.title: 🌾Chrome分頁裁切標誌

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"07064590-7122-4af0-b2ff-4e80c9c50120","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭一般處分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd6f9234-1f9c-43e6-98a5-a0fce61c18fb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/3ad15af9-4c62-4a27-9cfc-d621ab4f4621","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"行政處分"},{"type":"text","text":"一文中，人民騎機車闖紅燈，警察（=行政機關）可以針對當下違法的騎士開單。並且騎士之後必定得繳納罰鍰。進一步來說，開罰單是一種行政處分，它讓行政機關能規範特定的對象。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"034151e2-53d7-4836-818b-92bfbe376094"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aca81971-7ded-4990-898c-bdc4e6532729"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不過，如果行政機關要規範一群不特定的人呢？比如一群民眾跑到總統府前抗議，警察想要求抗議民眾解散；又或者某間房子被認定成古蹟，行政機關欲強制全國人民，不准破壞那棟古蹟等等。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"22d17718-92cb-46c8-b182-0bc61442b552"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c69f9e74-4b29-4201-a04b-36318ca62eed"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"碰到上述兩種情況，行政機關不能以行政處分規範那群人。因為「抗議民眾」與「全國人民」都是不特定的對象。總而言之，行政機關不應採用行政處分，而是以「一般處分」來規範那些不特定的人群。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b28f8716-9949-496d-bcd9-1f1f02c06588","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一般處分的特徵"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"03541a50-bab5-4a2f-8716-c250eca1cf7f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一般處分是行政處分的變形。一般處分與行政處分的差異，在於前者"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"不符合具體性"},{"type":"text","text":"。要注意的是，在看一般處分的法條之前，讀者一定要先知道什麼是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/7481a502-f458-45ce-bdd1-b2d829ca8326","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"具體性"},{"type":"text","text":"。畢竟法條上不會寫。倘若不事先了解，直接看法條會看不懂。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"688c03e8-a8bd-4257-8cc5-facb961d0c0b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eff5b436-59c1-4ad6-bf73-da226d95aa95"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"簡言之，具體性的成立必須同時包含「相對人特定」以及「相關事實具體」；然而一般處分規範的是「不特定的相對人」。一群抗議民眾或全體人民都是不特定的人；至於相關事實為具體或抽象，則要看一般處分之下的類型而定。綜合來說，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"一般處分規範的對象不是特定的，但效力可能是一次性或反覆出現。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"17e01a67-635b-437b-a169-7d717797e8c6","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政處分 vs. 一般處分"}]},{"type":"table","attrs":{"id":"90a7e3a2-8149-4786-a417-ebdc350daf0e","hasRowHeader":false,"hasColumnHeader":false},"content":[{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"8f7f86ce-e0c7-4240-ab23-293e1d04c3f7"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"7680ebbb-bee9-4248-93c1-ccdd7eaaf63b","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[138.9828216491055],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dce89403-cfc6-4837-93f1-8e75f29d9abb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政行為➡️"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ebbb52b1-a9c3-486d-b47a-df68728fe58d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具體性特徵⬇️"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"83efac08-7b22-485c-b2ee-00cde796cf8f","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[97.01520857501603],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f68096be-021f-46df-a6e6-9057a7f41be0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政處分"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"8044dffa-870b-4d27-84b4-2816e1ee16b9","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[143.98471267718156],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2bbfeabf-33d5-4215-865f-11ed26b77cc4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一般處分"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"81ed760e-6438-4e5c-b06d-3e628654f84e"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"8149be3f-3588-4a15-9544-09d334d1b2f1","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[138.9828216491055],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b5185ae-d9f1-4051-a96d-980cd346759d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相對人（=對象）"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"f871a0e0-131b-429c-85de-35e524482a2f","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[97.01520857501603],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3b318ea-8d76-4421-b6ab-f7c9868fb8d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"特定"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"c41b44ee-1043-41f4-881e-83ea9c0f62db","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[143.98471267718156],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eb99d718-187f-41a8-bf8f-49c6d4e5c925"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"不特定"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"57a5f042-b141-4424-bb31-509b38846065"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"f4268058-376f-4ae1-a8f4-8a2ddaf5e3db","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[138.9828216491055],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e045323a-c24b-471a-8e59-14453ca157f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相關事實"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d5b07ab0-aea1-4494-95b7-63c5cee1f85b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"（效力）"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"c6f94b9a-2da3-4c96-97e1-af1ddaa98c3e","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[97.01520857501603],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7fbd7f71-0220-4e48-9e2d-629a0da0554f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具體"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f394fb37-9629-4b2f-9f7f-ef16f43a3db3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"（一次）"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"3ccebfcb-8f90-4cd4-92b7-b6fd748ee6a1","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[143.98471267718156],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f29dc0c3-1da7-4a9f-8b93-b151a45d8bdc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具體／抽象"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b14bbe3-b520-4995-8ca2-0f01571bf17b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"（一次／反覆）"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b138b0be-2ea4-471c-aeaa-3deae3388a0f","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一般處分的類型"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5944df1a-3280-4db4-b4bf-a49f130899ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"上一段提過，一般處分所規範的事件，其相關事實可能是具體或抽象。於是這裡再進一步區分，將一般處分拆成兩種類型："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3aecffcf-b735-495f-b6fb-bc4cc660a299","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5be4ffaf-fe63-41cf-a3ec-cbd160440ea2"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9e046223-9f86-4da0-bda6-93cd0f0eb1d8"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e544f986-5ef5-48fe-bb42-b948af298a40","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9a1001d0-7737-4487-b2d1-d0e04b561fca"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0770bd77-5c8d-42dd-87c9-87860e51b04b"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"760eae75-e03a-4715-9c9f-9ea6639e7310"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9a59d65-d4da-4932-ab7f-2b32f3c9e7d5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對人的一般處分，相關事實具體；對物的一般處分，相關事實抽象。至於類型的詳細說明，請點擊上方連結。由於兩個類型各自說明起來，內容也相當多。我認為繼續寫下去篇幅會太長。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81608f41-d5b5-46f1-b144-da8a42557c4f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b707028e-2427-4334-a1b5-125f0ca4dc01"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"下方表格則簡單整理了兩個類型的差異。當讀者看完連結裡的說明，再回頭看表格會更清楚一些。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4e50af32-fdb9-4779-8703-c69e801f6284","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"類型差異"}]},{"type":"table","attrs":{"id":"b1ace75d-8060-4e2b-9bda-9c11ab135c6b","hasRowHeader":false,"hasColumnHeader":false},"content":[{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"8d321d03-400f-42cf-9adb-2fd8d9d9a901"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"4cd565ee-a58a-48f6-a6df-7f5d8c85aa3b","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[134.00723632032228],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f83de78-d1ee-4756-bbe1-9ab8f9aee4fa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一般處分類型➡️"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"978cd363-7f92-4991-bc34-fb3d5bc941ef"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"說明⬇️"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"725c1bb4-54da-4f9b-8799-9e2c866ee1d5","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[114.43948144611196],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5efb97e7-8313-401b-bfaf-ab2910c5d727"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對人一般處分"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"309b1afe-2084-4956-a69e-e163e3f27c58","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[117.44576907491805],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c0c3537-9625-4b6b-b57c-6809181aeb45"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對物一般處分"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"abb69602-d545-4fd5-ab7d-c8b471db121b"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"cf379bca-9e87-4cc9-addd-06934760336c","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[134.00723632032228],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc4bc4c1-cac3-4e83-a841-7d90e2d73493"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相關事實"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e60ff7d1-2b53-4f1a-bc2d-bd8bb81fbf7e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"（效力）"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"9fbe668b-d0b6-443d-ab01-42fd514ae026","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[114.43948144611196],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"41708446-89b6-4f6e-ad27-152583541da3"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"具體"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"097e1530-12cf-4433-9f32-1b3efb0f1579"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"（一次性）"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"f2f6faf2-4387-49f1-8043-1c4323fbc84e","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[117.44576907491805],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d120960a-cb23-4642-b843-2c8aef70fc5d"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"抽象"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f6cd390-600f-4c6b-9b22-354ccbe081e0"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"（反覆）"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"ef304236-2d33-43fd-9ff3-2721f53fdac5"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"4a4dcaf0-8d6b-4c48-aa5f-ef5df1a6d611","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[134.00723632032228],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57ca8d71-7a62-4fb9-adbb-ef5ac10802bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例子"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"13c57072-61ad-4682-adfb-dd878c077745","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[114.43948144611196],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8d2a169-3fec-47d1-b656-337bfbbcc8e3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"解散命令"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"af2e036a-7749-49b5-b957-4d1effc60626","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[117.44576907491805],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"53e929b0-e3af-4a6e-a71b-7a0c89ca68b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"古蹟的設定"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28d4554f-c9d3-4eb6-bd22-e273f15f2959"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"67e4b855-d14d-441d-a51d-a90bc6f0cbf2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"綜上所述，我們可以說：「一般處分沒有具體性。」然而所謂的沒有具體性，是哪裡沒有具體性？兩種類型必須區分清楚："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c0f0c8e3-21fa-42bf-b6dd-c17178540248","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e01f6055-33c0-4213-809e-9fd40cc3b5a9"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"對人的一般處分"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"859f1298-70f6-48d5-8dd4-18c36e9f53e8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5abdcd19-3808-49ab-ac91-dc010aabdb96"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對象的部分沒有符合具體性，效力符合具體性。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"25cbe541-bb2b-4263-9961-1a8ef05816f4","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"889c1037-4b03-48ae-99d0-5e883e2c052c"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"對物的一般處分"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cf016968-cc1f-4430-95fd-040894f6af82","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1075a090-0f33-475a-918c-6083d7faf8ed"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具體性的兩個要件都不符合。"}]}]}]},{"type":"table","attrs":{"id":"4af0a925-c98e-4cb8-b3cb-88233aa7f8e9","hasRowHeader":true,"hasColumnHeader":true},"content":[{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"63183adc-bfed-4187-ba05-5caad3f376ec"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"81e47eaa-7362-45ab-9521-08f91bf145a0","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[177.98553402029935],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"06ecfe2d-2109-4e9a-b4d2-79481c8a1821"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相對人（=對象）➡️"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2778638-2afb-479e-b6dd-e3dcff531c27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相關事實⬇️"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"023ea192-a4e7-4881-9f33-d1e9ca2984ba","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[126.31512371193872],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52e3558c-6d73-49e7-ab63-c54a5ce62b03"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"特定✅"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"e5b35d05-ab91-4758-95ae-edb33a3672e8","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[112.32778144417678],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8cd469a5-8426-4c6d-bc6a-a71e348603df"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不特定❌"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"ceae404f-250d-4b40-8f5a-fd167d38be40"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"5fe2be34-6fd1-43e6-ac88-e6be350af74b","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[177.98553402029935],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"47fa2224-ca18-44cb-af4d-5ce16fcadd01"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具體（效力一次性）✅"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"7199c2f5-2fce-474d-9c9c-5e89a04c34b1","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[126.31512371193872],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9de122da-2dd1-4e86-9dde-19a0b709d491"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"典型之行政處分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23b32471-3a4b-42d0-aac8-bd1dd2096acb"}}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"bd306458-69f0-4ae2-8f0a-d10e03679d9f","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[112.32778144417678],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae91b7eb-8451-4fef-959a-a4032d631833"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對人一般處分"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"a7337054-ebcc-4797-9997-2d7d1b9962ba"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"6bf34353-3983-47ca-b2ef-a169a2404c5d","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[177.98553402029935],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da07de4a-54c7-41be-b944-d258134f836a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"抽象（效力反覆）❌"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"6c134a0b-54fb-420e-804a-18ab3c0fec5c","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[126.31512371193872],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1f04b58-349c-44c9-81c9-b901d80fca8a"}}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"85bec01d-8392-4e78-80dd-e1b61201cbbe","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[112.32778144417678],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d4037d1-2616-41f3-b439-deccb25f426b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對物一般處分"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"75937d22-ef67-4b30-9302-bf9388d0e696","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"適用行政處分的法條"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"014173b1-6571-4888-857a-abe621740b76"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一般處分不是典型的行政處分。因為一般處分沒有行政處分的第三個要件：具體性。換句話說，一般處分規範不特定對象。因此照理來說，一般處分不適用行政處分的法條。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8fbe34c5-ec26-4e2c-90f0-749cf9e05e36"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e77a8283-9b4c-4428-801f-62b9cc5a8585"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"然而透過《行政程序法》第92條第2項的架橋規定，使得一般處分適用行政處分的相關法條："}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"1e283fad-8102-40a1-a39b-b1546d4e9af1"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73121e38-4429-4898-9edd-6608609eaa6e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d411c3e1-84e7-4776-8f91-de9f55c6a1de"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4411747-6b77-46c9-888f-2d90f9b99110"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前項決定或措施之相對人雖非特定，而依一般性特徵可得確定其範圍者，為"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"一般處分"},{"type":"text","text":"，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"適用本法有關行政處分之規定"},{"type":"text","text":"。有關公物之設定、變更、廢止或其一般使用者，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"亦同"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"aa48a6c0-0c26-4513-86de-2a677ec5d15a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"67f20fda-d567-4207-95b5-57d7ab49eb0e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"條文中的「一般處分」，指的是對人的一般處分，不是對物的一般處分。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d67eb83e-cb2b-4e8b-a6c3-3bdee6f7b63e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5d477797-1db5-4894-8f89-59863059fd27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"亦同：準用行政處分的規定。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0943b95b-308a-456d-9559-ee0e271d8bfb"}}]}
cards.title: 💭一般處分

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7276bbe9-c579-4468-a637-751a74db180d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🌾行政處分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b951201-1ea0-4046-abd1-e6844ac36c03"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"天空下著暴雨，你正在騎機車送外賣。然而外送APP顯示再過1分鐘，你就會受到平台的超時處罰。你將被平台收取很大筆的金額，基本上這個單就白送了。不過只要再過一個紅綠燈，你就能在時間之內送完餐點。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"649c0c0b-39ff-4b8e-9592-25a4539fd4d2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dd1a8234-9e37-4c69-9803-4d3370d5e512"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你不想被平台罰錢。抬頭一看，紅燈還有70秒。你心想不如就衝了，反正馬路上也沒什麼車。於是你催油門直接闖紅燈。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"032b4581-930c-4df9-b27b-21a254babad8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75bf40f5-9b77-4fc4-b7d6-4e1909341d68"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"結果，警察就在路邊。他要求你臨停，並開了一張罰單給你。你實在氣不過，於是對著警察大吼：「你憑什麼開我罰單？我是不會繳錢的！」「這是行政處分，你得繳罰緩。」警察無奈地說。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38da27f8-5cf0-4bb6-9f39-7a6065d9f082"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"25f84816-a24f-4364-bb0f-454865f0d87b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"至此，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"「警察開一張罰單給你」，就是一種行政處分。"},{"type":"text","text":"進一步來說，警察當然有權對民眾開罰單，不過他的權力仍制約於行政處分的相關法規。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7eabe227-d278-4d03-a94b-7851e0aa9b13"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2d26b0d-e0d8-42f3-9ea7-495cdb11e867"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"接下來，我將會說明行政處分的要素，然後將要素套回闖紅燈的事件。最後亦提供更多例子，協助讀者熟悉行政處分的定義。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"aba1e422-0228-4ce3-b87b-c491b0adf48b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"04d2f5cd-707d-4e5a-8165-6aa04287f63c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政處分之要素"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7486e9aa-f452-45aa-bac2-01669264ce83","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc04b147-f02a-47ae-83b8-33991541b553"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"套用實例說明"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ae9a5d9d-2f03-48ee-9b1d-71a42d6fc36e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f43c2b64-fa02-4db6-9f12-3cb6ffc35ef3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更多例子"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"10fe1121-9f83-4eb1-af6d-27a5e4f9ec0e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政處分的要素"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf59329f-856b-448d-91f6-f7aadb726898"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"什麼是行政處分？根據《行政程序法》第92條第1項，一個行政行為只要符合六大要素，即可稱之為行政處分："}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"7f80e511-21a2-4079-88e1-582e86b3868a"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6da5c62-121e-4b13-b647-1a0d1e2aa214"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6c02f9a7-0a7b-4c01-86e2-81968c590a53"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b5641e5c-93c1-4f75-b805-7893dc8f86ea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"本法所稱行政處分，係指"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"行政機關"},{"type":"text","text":"就"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"公法"},{"type":"text","text":"上"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"具體事件"},{"type":"text","text":"所為之決定或其他公權力措施而"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"對外"},{"type":"text","text":"直接"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"發生法律效果"},{"type":"text","text":"之"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"單方"},{"type":"text","text":"行政行為。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ba2117b-0751-491a-94de-96aedd7a80b8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法條寫得很難懂。簡言之，行政處分由上方高亮處的六個零件所組成，整理如下："}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"163d1aae-1535-4420-b6d9-35edc492488a","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"460e1cf4-85df-4742-b941-7a8d92c3c044"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政機關"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8c2ba0f0-2868-419a-85bc-529685998902","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5d3c3f5b-d3dc-451b-bb45-858243884baf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公法"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"355c95c4-0a3e-450d-a842-2bdf762e5688","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6bce4a81-7b18-4e45-b31e-f2f5b7ac5797"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具體"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"db70244a-8165-4718-90a1-ad4bf7c70fb3","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9086a67-f59f-4479-829b-3d4a5f79fc2f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"單方"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0cdb1d54-2301-43a9-b28b-cb4087d5ac62","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dae19adf-0392-42b2-b256-17342ad656d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"外部"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"14dc0d7b-529b-45a5-afe0-8b9bdbfd27d9","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"10a76126-0dce-48c8-8378-c5877b51868e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法效果"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ca9ae8f-cdb9-4715-a138-6c1314d4b182"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1cd97cb-4004-42c6-a8da-2ef3f7ba20d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用一句話來講，行政處分就是「"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"行政機關依照公法所做的具體、單方、外部、具有法效果的的行政行為"},{"type":"text","text":"」；反過來說，如果一個行政行為無法湊足上述六個要素，那就不能稱之為行政處分。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4012722f-545b-4b79-89f3-319cb55c0bca","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"套用實例說明"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a19f76e6-7b9f-4ffa-9231-57117e92b0ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"為了更清楚說明何謂行政處分，我們將六大要素，直接套進外送員的闖紅燈事件。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"51bfe70a-97b5-4352-8cc2-f26d82f3fb0b","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"1. 行政機關"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f5ecd0a9-8f4e-4151-9309-a3cfc422c8b1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"罰單是警察（＝"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/d29d8430-e7bb-45fe-ac63-0b9d0e00ecec","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"行政機關"},{"type":"text","text":"）做成的。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8bf8ed88-fd47-49f6-af31-03602fabfa85","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"2. 公法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"25e1f231-715e-43fe-9022-966afcb11840"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"警察依照《道路交通管理處罰條例》第53條第1款，向闖紅燈的外送員開罰單。（實際罰鍰要看相關細則。）"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"36dd3432-7e1a-4833-9508-1b4e3840ab01"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a50e6ea2-373f-4093-8f92-941e91651739"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawSingle.aspx?pcode=K0040012&flno=53","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"道路交通管理處罰條例第53條第1款"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e4ed477d-32f2-442f-84db-88eb53addc72"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/99f9cf2f-378e-4951-8fef-8e2a7f2dcc06","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"汽車駕駛人"},{"type":"text","text":"，行經有燈光號誌管制之交岔路口闖紅燈者，處新臺幣一千八百元以上五千四百元以下罰鍰。"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e9144b30-1ca0-4264-b5ee-634ecc84314a","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"3. 具體"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e9921b3-f38d-491d-a04a-cda64883df8d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"警察針對「外送員闖紅燈」這件事情開罰單。總不會外送員根本沒違法，警察看他不爽就隨意開罰單。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7127ddb1-1263-4201-aa77-f348ea19eda6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3a2e9b60-bd1f-47d5-a48b-8bc392c75cae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"要注意的是，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/7481a502-f458-45ce-bdd1-b2d829ca8326","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"法律領域所認知的「具體」"},{"type":"text","text":"，跟一般人的生活常識有所不同。法律中講的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"具體性必須包含以下兩個特徵"},{"type":"text","text":"："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"48d79b2e-1a36-4a60-b9f7-331aa8247e24","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4fcfabd7-6545-4456-9aa0-7d689f0a21ea"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"對象特定"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f0cc97f-857f-438d-b46f-7499b4e88f52"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"規範作成時，相對人必須特定。以外送員的例子來說，當警察作成罰單時，其規範的對象為當下闖紅燈的外送員。而這位外送員就是特定的相對人。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9720fc90-3a48-4e10-a5f2-7b269ed469a7","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"26d073f1-f74e-430d-8400-03ea2eaf170a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"相關事實具體（效力一次性）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fb0160db-5c4e-4e74-8481-018e6a3ca4e4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政處分的效力是一次性的。換句話說，外送員收到一張罰單，就繳一次罰款；不可能外送員只收到一張罰單，還得繳多次的錢。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd59491d-5341-46f8-844f-8bfb0e318ff2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"綜上所述，行政處分必須是針對「特定具體的事件」所為之行為。所以行政處分的要素之一，便是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"特定具體行為"},{"type":"text","text":"（簡稱：具體性）。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6b314217-de84-4144-a735-c82f2002f2c7","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"4. 單方"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7444112d-33cb-465c-ae99-e24d695d3c2e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一定是警察單方面給外送員開罰單；反之，民眾不會主動跟警察要罰單。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"95e0f76c-69e7-4dd2-a612-811b42e83350","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"5. 外部"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3a4ea949-cd48-4175-b021-7192108d274d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"警察（行政機關）對外面的人民所做的，而非行政機關對行政機關（內部）。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d9ecad7c-a24d-465d-9acc-0a71166b6fad","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"6. 法效果"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8d366792-c61d-420c-a315-bf4877f5be8d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人民得繳罰款。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fdce3d05-075c-4887-aa01-1172c9789175","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更多例子"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c614fd68-24a0-4e37-8b86-57054d0d6f9d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"倘若想知道還有哪些屬於行政處分，以下是其他例子。所有內容均會套用前面講到的六大要件："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"48d838aa-5f2d-4c07-a200-8c8c8ae2828a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff30d9e2-96b2-49fb-82ef-fda7d768b522"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b3e82003-77af-4189-99d0-b6b5a5cfb6c7"}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 🌾行政處分

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8cc1c9dc-e864-4183-9fe7-b8bda5d573a9","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政程序法第92條第1項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75194a3a-d565-4fe6-a860-8848bb18c3ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawSingle.aspx?pcode=A0030055&flno=92","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"行政程序法第92條第1項"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"35df751a-ed89-4955-a8c1-599c2d861f72"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8018e78e-dc13-4d35-8b11-935b4f9840ec"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"本法所稱行政處分，係指行政機關就公法上具體事件所為之決定或其他公權力措施而對外直接發生法律效果之單方行政行為。"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8f676ac2-dd82-4bb5-a22d-f43a3fbe56a0","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"說明與應用"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cbccf6eb-0f14-48af-860a-b40bbd702036"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政處分之定義"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9c128618-8d6f-4169-ae1d-7eb9955cc20c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d139f106-97b0-4a93-ac82-b336116d8b85"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3ad15af9-4c62-4a27-9cfc-d621ab4f4621"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"70ef14de-0a79-4d27-86e2-3fa98526e66a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2044dc23-bdd9-4f36-a0ae-eb54653df795"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"83d33a73-89a3-4ec1-8374-b89ccf6a78c2"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9e3a6c79-d843-4c04-b7e9-82ab738ab617","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cb9b78ed-09b8-4b68-9c13-b6ef1cc0263f"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"86db8f98-9260-4a3b-8de9-12fb3f0e3b9d"}}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9d5d0940-808d-4cd2-9543-a83dc8ee7009"}}]}
cards.title: 行政程序法第92條第1項

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"271cc78a-b079-424a-b7ff-1508c0e4c460","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"「汽車」一詞包含機車"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a892dce8-c520-464f-ab7e-61567ef318d1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一開始查資料，我很困惑為什麼民眾騎機車闖紅燈，是依《道路交通管理處罰條例》第53條第1款裁罰。因為法規中明明只寫「汽車」駕駛人。可是外送員騎的是機車，所以應該要有另一條法規開頭寫「機車」駕駛人才對？"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"9d77c6dc-9c27-4f93-bc6a-65f5c2404cdf"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ada47ee-1bee-4273-90e2-fb007463c7e9"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawSingle.aspx?pcode=K0040012&flno=53","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"道路交通管理處罰條例第53條第1款"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f6b18e3-4608-4475-81b4-7512e4c81dcd"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"汽車駕駛人"},{"type":"text","text":"，行經有燈光號誌管制之交岔路口闖紅燈者，處新臺幣一千八百元以上五千四百元以下罰鍰。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d5dcdba2-1387-4870-b4ee-53068a41beda"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b7a9c19b-9de9-45e2-b81e-5f1d8aa6c164"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"後來我在同一部法規中，先看開頭的幾個條文。（通常前面的條文會先說明名詞的定義。）我在同法第3條第8款找到答案。原來"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"法規中的「汽車」一詞，也包含機車。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"9ea19cba-7e81-40a1-a922-fa6f65727cff"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"298276ee-193e-45c2-b43b-f85fef6733b0"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawSingle.aspx?pcode=K0040012&flno=3","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"道路交通管理處罰條例第3條第8款"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6990b6d-c67b-4300-a080-044b5a2aa57b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"八、車輛：指非依軌道電力架設，而以原動機行駛之"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"汽車（包括機車）"},{"type":"text","text":"、慢車及其他行駛於道路之動力車輛。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ebf30ab-df0a-4abf-bde9-5857baffe33b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"86d4ab29-7bf0-47f1-9c3d-f205d9ad0293"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法規真的跟我理解的生活常識很不同。在《道路交通管理處罰條例》中，只要看到條文裡寫「汽車」兩個字，通常就包含汽車與機車。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7732f5be-c049-4f14-b88c-553bc9d8ab87"}}]}
cards.title: 「汽車」一詞包含機車

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f4700ff3-7984-4203-9e0d-6c47a283ffee","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"核發補助"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e630695-eb4e-492a-9adc-473bb862b80b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"臺北市的房子很貴，於是政府提出一項政策：民眾只要符合資格，就可以向政府請求核發補助。此政策的推出，使得民眾更容易購得臺北市的房子。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ad065705-3c74-4b45-b4e6-e84b51542de4","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1. 行政機關"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f398c15-944a-4348-b929-8d57a7851f6d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"臺北市政府"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ab4d5b74-0174-47a4-971c-da4fb361af58","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2. 公法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"890102d9-983c-41c0-a443-bfb68492a3be"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根據"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawAll.aspx?pcode=D0050213","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"《社會福利基本法》"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0cb83af6-5c3f-42db-b95a-7ef502fb9fe4","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3. 具體"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c8d1d994-fe3b-4e24-9876-de8e3396b8be"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提供民眾購屋補助"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e5323e5b-72e5-4799-9767-e3c542479998","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"409ecbd1-220f-4804-96dd-34976bf45655"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"對象特定"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd93723b-ab95-4a77-af0a-4f3a49150635"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"規範作成時，相對人必須特定。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2c476c64-e3d2-4e5b-b033-34d8a1eb352b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"85e12dd8-2a3d-4986-99f5-c52ea60dec66"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"相關事實具體（效力一次性）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2dbaf947-8e2b-4161-acc6-ac776e8f9e13"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政處分的效力是一次性的。因此我們可以回推事件的事實（相關事實）是具體的，而非抽象的。"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"77ebd460-9cb6-441a-827f-2838363970da","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4. 單方"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e91207e-8f87-4b57-aed1-492d780d4f30"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"核發補助是政府單方面對民眾所做成的。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6d129101-509a-4ead-b1b0-54c0799c5517","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b78c5e26-5dfd-45b5-9bad-8697356eee6f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"雖然民眾有去申請，乍看之下並非單方面。但是要注意：民眾有申請不代表政府一定會給補助款。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e3aff3b0-37eb-406f-bdd3-916a6096979f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ca836c3-6c14-4eab-ac80-5e5599dd604d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"核發補助這件事，政府可以要給不給，權限在於政府。民眾去申請只是符合其中一個條件而已。或許民眾不符合其他條件，那麼他就拿不到購屋補助款。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d526b6b6-3d86-4cef-b1aa-ce4369bf084e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8973415-a614-41ea-abdc-24c7ab8a1066"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"單方的相反是雙方。雙方指的是意思表示合致，也就是雙方要講好。顯然民眾去申請了，購屋補助款卻不見得拿得到。"}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fbe648b1-27c9-4298-871b-8d63de6101dc","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5. 外部"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"df370d47-5d15-4e7c-8dd5-949e608270fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"政府對外部人民所做的行政行為。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"68771068-0759-45a8-b022-c6379736d5e7","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6. 法效果"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"049434b7-7268-451b-982c-3591ab4a5084"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"符合申請資格的民眾，可獲得臺北市政府的購屋補助款。"}]}]}
cards.title: 核發補助

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"331649d8-bcdf-4240-8675-aeb8a4dad27c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政程序法第92條第2項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5a10d04e-eb08-4a44-a5a7-a03bdb8e6b3b"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawSingle.aspx?pcode=A0030055&flno=92","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"行政程序法第92條第2項"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"694a57e9-2839-4134-a5d4-7b8a66833492"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ad90de3-53d4-4495-b10b-7e5647331c35"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/6c02f9a7-0a7b-4c01-86e2-81968c590a53","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"前項"},{"type":"text","text":"決定或措施之相對人雖非特定，而依一般性特徵可得確定其範圍者，為一般處分，適用本法有關行政處分之規定。有關公物之設定、變更、廢止或其一般使用者，亦同。"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"26a8c0b2-21f6-4e83-b176-fb8c3dca4a85","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"說明與應用"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a64973b3-dabc-4d34-bb85-ef30d05eac9c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"該法條用於規範一般處分。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9e888eee-6504-4ca0-a413-4ab1547401b7","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd3bfb0f-9ba5-4374-b450-6c4813e4f2a8"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"86db8f98-9260-4a3b-8de9-12fb3f0e3b9d"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"38f05720-756f-4799-ab36-e5a7130bb594","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c692243c-05c6-43ad-a2f6-f37f5e237d12"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9e046223-9f86-4da0-bda6-93cd0f0eb1d8"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b3d9abe1-2b79-4636-a99c-83ed96aa34dd","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"538c22fd-529b-41a2-b134-f1bd9fa95976"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0770bd77-5c8d-42dd-87c9-87860e51b04b"}}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 行政程序法第92條第2項

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"352487c9-7f1f-4e16-9738-3d2b63a6e2f9","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具體性的反面：法規命令"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad62e223-e309-46a7-a62b-6fd504ae6346"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"反之，法規命令規範的是抽象的事件，其屬於"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"對象不特定"},{"type":"text","text":"又"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"效力反覆"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7fc0accc-d942-4d22-a497-0573e57ccee1","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"70148498-449a-464d-a291-ce1664ec078a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"對象不特定"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a3fd0923-72d9-4f5f-9701-f46973780f81","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"948ec724-50da-40ea-9896-fa2619a918ec"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法規命令的對象不特定。命令一旦作成，將影響全臺灣人民，即每個人都要遵守。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cb37258d-3ca9-4c35-a5b2-4cbc93e81994","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6345e60f-84ca-45f3-ad0c-346aa4251c9d"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"效力反覆"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e1dc856c-33b7-4bb3-adde-4c99651af60a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2805a7ca-0b71-4a74-b1dd-34bdcf83a4d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"臺灣人民每天都要遵守法規命令。今天要遵守，明天與後天也要。因此法規命令的效力反覆，並非一次性。"}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 具體性的反面：法規命令

hand."}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b37911dc-58e2-48f7-931b-7cc4cb017b8a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7aef7660-9901-473c-8888-9d8d09fc0bb6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"製作鴿子使用了7杯路易莎咖啡的飲料紙杯。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"2f0e93a5-80c6-44f7-b3c2-6b22dbbfcf2a"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"60ba1801-a012-40a7-9e01-807eb9f5618c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Producing pigeon consumed 7 drink cups of Louisa Coffee (路易莎咖啡)."}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b06bed1-4174-4608-86f6-9eb9b0462fe9"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"海報6（右側）："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7d7449c6-fa5b-41b7-8c72-5f447bba445f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fa3b060b-3583-4182-9186-5812123d9283"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"離手後，不是回收再生，是焚燒殆盡。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"adf786d4-4444-4119-ab26-18881294f90c"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3725d822-1453-40c0-abf9-01bc74020584"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"After release, not recycling but complete incineration."}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"77dbc75b-4da0-478c-8155-21adb184391c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce0c5816-bf3f-420d-b1d8-1150cfa1a273"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"製作灰藍山雀使用了4杯春水堂的飲料紙杯。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"8fbba8eb-fc29-4022-99ec-7a07bd4279c9"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a0cc051c-6cd2-4cb0-a849-4bd132557183"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Producing azure tit consumed 4 drink cups of Chun Shui Tang (春水堂)."}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f46695b1-9618-420e-be0f-917770827d49"}}]}
cards.title: 海報內容

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5ad023c8-29dd-4f0a-8a32-45fb8c42713c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"紙杯的收集途徑"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2bffd9fc-9c05-411d-9cb8-230e94d2c4c2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我們主要從臺灣藝術大學的內部回收廠，撿拾使用過的的飲料紙杯。額外還有一小部分來自各學校系館的垃圾桶。由於校內的杯子通常剛丟棄不久，使得其形體較為完整之外，我們就近清洗也十分方便。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d618191-377e-44d1-bdb5-6fb30ca2d917"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"480ad18f-97dd-42cd-945e-a136dc5e38a6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我們曾經在捷運站垃圾桶撿拾過飲料紙杯，但是我們發現大家都不會喝完。人們為了趕搭車，常常剩下一點點飲料就丟棄，導致我們帶回去清洗有困難，飲料時不時就在半路灑出來。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21614672-eab5-4a63-8611-7dea506c528f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"86d72e9d-8bc9-4644-9acb-b695e492483b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一方面，我們也想過到大型回收站撿拾飲料紙杯。不過那裏的杯子已經放了很多天，同時經過長途運輸，杯體常常被壓爛了。還有民眾也不會清洗杯子內部，造成氣味非常難聞，因此我們不採用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c16f5b8-41f8-46b7-940a-74120e01a6c9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"813d8e25-d5c3-4b6f-973f-4a07e24de7c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"從垃圾堆中翻找出我們需要的飲料紙杯，意外地成為我們當時的快樂泉源。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5e542849-371a-4538-9fb5-96dd76973992","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"Source of Paper Cups"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f5d73f84-e739-4907-8c79-2fa03812d544"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Some of the paper cups we used are mainly from the recycling facilities in National Taiwan University of Arts, and the others are from trash bins in the buildings of different departments. Since the cups on campus are usually discarded shortly, in addition to their relatively complete shape, it is also convenient for us to clean them nearby."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e71c2f43-bc55-4c10-b7f8-1b16d7242640"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"91b3f298-de4a-4be3-bdc6-3f95b693f354"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"We once picked up paper cups from trash bins at the metro station, but we found that people rarely finish their drinks. Due to rushing to catch the subways, people often discard the cups with a little liquid left, making it difficult for us to collect the cups. Sometimes, the drinks spilled out along the way."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"adb5c6c2-08e4-4989-8407-0fb32995a8ca"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f1f827b-05ef-4fa8-b267-d7e7acf6f607"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"On the other hand, we also considered collecting paper cups from the large recycling stations. However, the cups have been there for many days and undergone long-distance transportation, often resulting in crushed cups. Moreover, people do not clean the interiors of the cups, causing them to emit unpleasant odors, so we do not use them."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89b1ceb0-5efc-4e8a-82a4-b66cb4a6abec"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7422de17-7b47-40d7-b247-54a72c99b436"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Searching for the paper cups we needed from the piles of garbage unexpectedly became a joy for us at that time."}]}]}
cards.title: 紙杯的收集途徑

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d7ac6196-d021-46a3-8680-324bcf31efc4","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"查看自己的github倉庫佔了多少儲存空間"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"31b9d93e-44d1-497e-880a-c5f84111846c"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://blog.csdn.net/i042416/article/details/86666843","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://blog.csdn.net/i042416/article/details/86666843"}]}]}
cards.title: 查看自己的github倉庫佔了多少儲存空間

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"58811cab-297f-499a-970f-d94560a3c03d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭標誌設計問題"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"119a9842-57c8-4d58-9fb3-0f931502899b","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202401311246052.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"20%","originalHeight":128,"originalWidth":128,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4ade624c-c9bf-43e5-a5a5-f6cba7058ccb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"上方是我大學時期為自己製作的標誌，然而我將標誌實際放到網頁上縮到很小的時候，我完全看不出來它的大輪廓是圓形，因為左下角的細線與正下方的最小圓形幾乎看不到。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"09bb4f4b-7305-4a8f-985c-1c068a9374fc","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Microsoft Edge分頁顯示："}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d021a2d5-f827-4ee8-9f00-bafca7a28224","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202401311206886.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","originalHeight":55,"originalWidth":410,"alignment":"left"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c160feea-6616-498c-8f0d-af999bddddd6","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Google Chrom分頁顯示："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"47809452-5473-4ba6-b3de-661c592894fa","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81b12604-9e74-459a-be36-cd0299bbe2cd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Google Chrom的Favicon顯示還特別奇怪，會切到標誌的底部。倘若我開啟二個以上的分頁，連標誌的右側也會切到。我看其他網路上的Favicon也會這樣。👉"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/d2372816-0b65-4657-bbd9-7a813e095b14","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"我的解法"}]}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"3ede46b8-e217-4f48-ae38-0e99ee68f298","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202401311121454.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"100%","originalHeight":68,"originalWidth":816,"alignment":"left"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"08c3c735-d06a-40c1-8c93-e5edd5c93ddd"}},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"d23b0f20-6d31-4d22-ba7e-113a08fc6412"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f234f8ec-7b4f-4dbc-a26b-b0098a6d8008"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"雖然當初繪製標誌時，我有測試最小使用尺寸，但因為這顆標誌沒有實際應用，所以即便當時我已經知道看不清整體輪廓，卻也不是很在意這件事。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"e2aa0bb3-1592-4ec7-a439-fb5b0d04be07","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202402022350996.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1125,"originalWidth":1500,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"cdf5611d-9ec9-486b-abcf-2219ce90cd2e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f1c6a9d9-6023-4c4b-ac91-ffa6c498633b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可是我現在正經營個人網誌，標誌用得到，這才讓我正視該問題。我甚至考慮實際印刷到紙上看看，標誌大概不用像分頁顯示那麼小，就已經糊成一團。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8fd7562a-9cf6-4a17-95d6-36e539575a41"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0b17b293-21b9-4271-8505-833cd595f2c9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"綜上所述，這顆標誌需要重新調整，未來有機會將實施這項「大工程」。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fcc9d86c-ff58-49c6-b346-562a02dea8d4"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"90d6af5e-8ee3-4ad7-8069-f1bc12d270fa"}}]}
cards.title: 💭標誌設計問題

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5f9618b9-631f-4328-b4e7-4329a0e9c53c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🌾從Blog檢視文章編排"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d9cce866-89e6-43b7-b0da-b9163e9370a1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自從使用"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://notes.dabing.one/post?note-id=b81a2f54-ec5b-4de0-9e97-ab841c0e18f9&active-note-id=b81a2f54-ec5b-4de0-9e97-ab841c0e18f9","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"數字花園"},{"type":"text","text":"，我發覺自己更加注意文章的編排邏輯。除了我想確保其他人看得懂，甚至我自己也是觀眾的其中一員。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1ada4c5a-3f98-4118-8c08-f9802f71c634"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c9b6ba9-5a0b-4303-8120-2e96468e433d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尤其是最近我要學習陌生的領域（人事行政）。對我來說，需要熟悉的知識點還非常多。可是我往往沒幾天就忘了。而數字花園就能很好地協助我複習。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2fd62c54-404f-4488-866d-22e3caaea09a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b7ebda52-711d-48d5-bbf4-130d3d9c423c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更精確地說，我平常把數字花園當作個人筆記本。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"如果我從網站裡找不到自己需要的知識點，那我就知道文章的架構還需要調整。"},{"type":"text","text":"特別是當我已經忘記先前看的資料脈絡。以腦袋空空的狀態來閱讀自己寫的東西，通常很容易就能找出問題。例如我讀到一半思緒飄走了，我就會回頭檢查是哪個段落沒有扣緊主題；又或者僅僅只是用錯連結詞或標點符號，導致句子之間的推論不是很順暢。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6e4b7b71-ca73-4c9f-91aa-39efde5189a7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dee856df-7e2a-4671-b816-91035160101f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一方面，藉由後續的編修過程，我能更進一步鞏固自己的學習記憶。每當我打開網站，我就會重新閱讀自己寫的文字。看着看著我就會想：「哦，原來我曾經寫過這些。嗯……不過現在把這段移到另一個位置，讀者（我）應該會更容易理解吧？」接著，當我隔天再次閱讀同一篇文章。倘若覺得自己讀得更加輕鬆了，那麼我就會感到很開心。畢竟至少還有我一個人，會認為讀這裡的內容很有意思。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4448edb2-9b71-49c4-a9c4-1210a1cd9c2c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"84e84232-0c8e-418d-b8ad-a683665cc7cc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"現在我很享受寫Blog，幾乎天天都泡在這裡。🌾"}]}]}
cards.title: 🌾從Blog檢視文章編排

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2b29b4ef-f7d9-4861-b60a-5f1aebf9c044","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Tag的測試方向"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8ab8dc29-ae66-4096-83bd-22740dc3ea04"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目前我還是以蒐集Journal卡片為主。我完全沒有拆分Journal裡的內容，我仍然保留其預設的時間標題。並且每天寫Journal的時候就為其附上Tag，之後再進Table的Text註記相關主題的內容大意。等到以後我有機會可以將它們集結成文，再開新的白板與卡片去統整。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0cd59c92-d487-4c66-9c55-3110dd0c9d88"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e150a6f-55b3-412f-9edf-96245e077707"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外，我認為Kanban也可以進一步篩選Journal的內容。例如我會為Journal的成熟度高低設置Status，再進到Kanban介面管理。未來當我想要彙整時，我就能夠優先查看成熟度高的Journal。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"927c6a2b-500c-4bef-8750-881ec20c6e42"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f1c21b29-8aca-4c40-b729-0945aefab056"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不過我才剛開始接觸Tag的功能，所以當前僅僅只是有點想法而已。由於我還沒有完整實操過一輪（輸出成文章），因此我不確定計畫在未來能否順利進行。"}]}]}
cards.title: Tag的測試方向

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a904a671-d8f5-41e4-8edb-713b3f7fc034","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"常用Emoji"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e041614e-0f04-4c14-9d8e-387dd47195e0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3bd79e51-361a-4b13-85f6-c8c50260c10d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🌾"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"30cdee68-a10a-448a-af34-e08a808f0fa1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"👉"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"af297ec7-4c26-442c-afb3-2e1d39dd935f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"⚠️"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e226517-74cd-4e16-ac12-216a39f676ee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"👆"}]}]}
