604a4","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[120],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"df869a14-4a31-46bf-8822-fd93fc9ddb0a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"683730a4-f5b4-4d93-9cc9-b3e189369e15"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/d29d8430-e7bb-45fe-ac63-0b9d0e00ecec","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"第2項"}]}]}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0a69efc0-dee2-40fd-87ee-2a4ebceee190","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第二章 行政處分"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0d172870-189f-4c5b-93d9-028102d2bd87","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第一節 行政處分之成立"}]},{"type":"table","attrs":{"id":"589fd30a-ab77-431d-9f11-3abcf2d1c7a1","hasRowHeader":false,"hasColumnHeader":false},"content":[{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"10c7b9b7-cd68-4ac8-9e52-92dd7a1c78a5"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"483734d9-76a6-4971-a318-293be92eb10b","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[122.99636988897198],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"154e1cf4-b483-48fb-b51d-af6cf84cfea9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"條號"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"dfdc958a-436a-4532-9a24-e3ebc6afaa8b","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[120],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba206240-5994-4f96-b935-cdfcf00fd01a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"條旨"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"719a25df-50b6-4a79-8a82-04df46fac920","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[114.00726022205602],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"365472d0-5ffa-4eee-b1ad-452f3c27c9e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"項"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"fe19f9f3-3f7f-42a0-be6e-9093b5e6c8cc"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"f1203b25-b352-4d13-b4c5-65cfd0c40fad","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[122.99636988897198],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fe1a0a5c-bf6e-4bb7-9ce0-40ab8ad07443"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawSingle.aspx?pcode=A0030055&flno=92","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"第92條"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"faf399e6-93d8-46e4-955d-9e74ffefb87e","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[120],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e4ae759-d240-468a-93a9-a2a8a6df5a78"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政處分之定義"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"830cae6b-0d3e-4897-9a78-c4c5836a36fa","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[114.00726022205602],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7ab498d2-7dd3-437a-9633-2c77739005c9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9273a49-0d50-4fa3-9c61-62c9a480e464"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/6c02f9a7-0a7b-4c01-86e2-81968c590a53","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"第1項"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8cf604de-b918-4c87-bb62-ad202c20b2ee","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"214ae00b-4f5a-4f97-999b-4b4f17a6d7e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/d411c3e1-84e7-4776-8f91-de9f55c6a1de","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"第2項"}]}]}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 《行政程序法》

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"360f3b50-346e-4b68-8a50-5ab67cddc632","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🌾Blog主頁參考"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a0b807a9-5000-43f9-83b1-36a480c726fc","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"找參考的過程"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b30c957b-2d7d-4270-b524-c5e4b021489a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我本來在查看自己YT左列訂閱過的頻道，然後我就滑到「"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/@ChineseArtistsNet/featured","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"黃簡講書法"},{"type":"text","text":"」。我不知道黃老師的頻道最近還有無更新。因為我記得老師有對外說過自己身體不是很好，所以影片的錄製進度要視其健康狀況而定。我馬上點進去瀏覽頻道。幸好頻道兩週前還有更新，老師的身體狀態應該還可以。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"9a6baa0b-5408-4caf-adf1-7c16cf21329a","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202403131553531.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":955,"originalWidth":1859,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"259ed4df-258c-46c8-bf03-51795aa181c8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f35d6b13-9404-45fe-9fce-519129eef8c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"接著，我閱讀上方的頻道簡介。瞄到「國畫」兩個字。雖然書法我到現在還看不懂，因為自己是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/676e2933-51b8-46c4-97b7-ae84566db7e2","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"左撇子不好系統地學"},{"type":"text","text":"。不過國畫與其他畫種的差異我倒是很想先觀察看看。可惜頻道的播放清單裡只有書法類別，沒有國畫的影片。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d0fc8ed2-c25a-4175-9f3a-9b8c0ffca320","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202403131554392.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":939,"originalWidth":1902,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9332d71b-84c0-4070-999e-2c49da04c776"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"107e2e9c-6fe4-44cf-94af-39bd9a6f14f6","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"心儀的格式"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"00e412f8-25b8-46bf-9f17-92ccf3d53593"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"後來我同樣在頻道簡介看到黃簡老師的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://www.1800.com/huangjian/index.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"個人網頁連結"},{"type":"text","text":"。我認為可能裡面會有教國畫的資料。點進去一看我驚艷到了！倒不是我查到國畫的資料（裡面只有老師的創作記錄）。而是網站的主頁格式完全就是我的心頭好！"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bb1f495b-94f5-4990-baa4-576f1bad3cb2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"33696f53-f1e6-42bb-942c-f9dc11ded145"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"網站內的資訊一目了然，我能夠很快速地認識一個人。尤其我非常喜歡網頁簡潔地呈現老師關注的主題，並且在主題下方還有簡短的個人化說明。那樣我就能立即了解整個網站的結構與主題大意。我可以預期自己會看到哪些內容，就像是查閱書籍目錄一樣。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"35600f5e-6172-4165-aaac-97b1d31908f1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73f89ca8-8623-4902-94d1-9c04a9484148"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如下圖所示。如果我讀完主題說明，覺得自己對某個主題有興趣。那麼我只要點擊藍綠色的字，就能很方便跳轉頁面。（如果是整個方框都是按鈕就更好了。）"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"7c9c4529-f99e-4f17-83f3-d683f3a4f9a5","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202403131556747.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1237,"originalWidth":2560,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"26325f9f-b7b2-4cf0-b1a2-daa75977e3b0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3f09e333-f596-4dcc-9c89-ba62c0adf28f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以後我也想要照黃簡老師的網站，在數字花園搞個相似的編排邏輯。然而現階段我得先多寫一些內容，以慢慢形成不同的主題。未來我再想想怎麼將數字花園轉化成類似的格式。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"32702061-120b-4ef3-8761-6403dd6d6000"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"77cba964-04c2-4883-a679-72983a36ac4c","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有趣小插曲"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d2984af-255a-4b9c-b9c8-6c564b83eea3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"偷偷地說，我覺得老師寫的文字饒富趣味。我從他的主頁右測點擊「"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://www.1800.com/huangjian/resume.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"進來看看"},{"type":"text","text":"」。滑到網頁底部時，我看到老師描述自己只喜歡喝白開水，那一行寫著："}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"0445f5a1-6dd2-4602-8944-ef6d7bfccd09"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf4a2a5c-a8e4-438b-ab09-d89e2857c06a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"只喝白開水。咖啡、茶，一喝晚上就輾轉難眠，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"要害我很容易。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5993aba5-5ea8-42ae-8196-f3eccc0934c3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"高亮處的句子真的很可愛。🤣"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a8fefbee-55b4-47f8-bd1e-423dd2b1289b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a7acdbf8-863d-4449-ac3c-cd79b98483fa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"順帶一提，我也跟老師擁有相同的困擾。雖然我非常喜歡茶的香氣與滋味。但我只要一小杯喝下去，當天基本上就睡不著了。因此每次我在外頭碰到真的很想喝的飲料。只要該品項標示含有咖啡因，我就會盯著那杯飲料，同時心裡很猶豫地煩惱著：「我今晚還要不要睡覺？」"}]}]}
cards.title: 🌾Blog主頁參考

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"28b3a843-ca36-4d39-837e-4a008a5241ae","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以右手學習書法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8bbe66c7-8a97-4ae7-a307-7ab4684bc107"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大二上學期，我跑去修書畫系開的跨域課程。課程名稱為「"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/5b039ecc-b663-4ba3-89bf-f1242ab033b5","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"當代水墨論述"},{"type":"text","text":"」。難得有書畫系的課程開放給外系生選修，因此我馬上就選了。課程中不用實作，就是理論課。下課的時候，我私下問課堂教授：「我是左撇子，能夠學習書法嗎？」那位教授很雀躍地回答我：「當然可以！」教授本身就指導過左撇子的學生。他認為從創作的角度來看，左撇子寫出來的作品會很獨特。我想教授的意思是：左手寫出來的筆勢和畫面布局方法，可能會不同於右手使用者的創作習慣。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e8ade06e-4a40-4ea2-80fd-3df67085d665","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"欲右手習字的原因"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b391ac80-af8f-4319-9a41-91d760530c47"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我回家想了一下，我考慮以後要不要去書畫系修本科生的課。但幾天後我就放棄了。除了自己系上的課程都忙不過來。還有如果可以的話，我想以右手學習書法。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"410420b5-943c-41e4-87c6-9f1e3c91f79e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0463f857-1c82-4ab4-b18b-e9ea7ea3475d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我想用右手寫的原因，其實是我並不想深入鑽研書畫領域。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"我只想了解大部分右撇子的書畫家怎麼使用毛筆。"},{"type":"text","text":"還有毛筆能創造出來的視覺效果有哪些？在學習書法方面，我頂多想體驗到各種字體的基本筆畫怎麼寫，接著就想暫停深究了。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8f441128-981e-414a-a795-cc09035a2dde","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尚握不了毛筆"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8b4391bb-2b71-46f0-b072-ba94aaa06aa2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目前我的右手肌肉，還沒能訓練到能夠自在書寫小字的程度。我頂多能夠使用日常的右手工具，比如一般的剪刀跟滑鼠。換句話說，我的右手指肌肉不能做出非常細緻的動作。不過生活上必須右手使用的工具，我用起來還是挺適應的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b446de5e-d92f-4ce2-bba8-362b81f8bb51"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7bce65ff-c284-4ca2-8fd4-1f8b81b4cc79"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"哪天有時間，我再練習右手如何握毛筆吧！我其實覺得，以非慣用手從零開始學寫毛筆字，或許學習效果會很好。因為我會感覺自己的右手動作很生疏，我便會繃緊神經，每一刻都專注模仿眼前的示範畫面。那種感覺就跟小時候需要適應其它右撇子的專用工具一樣。熟能生巧！"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"96045c86-6335-4028-a59d-73a875aa5b6d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fdeaaba0-e9ef-4d14-8642-b9d4fa78f485"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6299ef22-595e-4ed1-9d2b-eb27ff7b884c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e21bc966-e524-4615-986f-16cd5d86124b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bba599d5-fd0f-4c71-ad44-01623f0834ff"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"31aa5b72-4685-46a4-a0d1-c918177c8bf6"}}]}
cards.title: 以右手學習書法

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"17eeef65-119a-48e4-a251-cc7ac08b2bfb","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭當代水墨論述"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f52426b-cbf2-44a4-949a-09454479ea3d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"當代水墨論述是我在大二上修過的課。具體的上課內容我幾乎忘得差不多了。因為平常得趕自己本科的作業。導致我課後幾乎沒時間整理其他領域的課程筆記。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"09bb1b70-ab7e-471c-9b82-9316bfb7049b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3fd4a37b-730c-48cf-90ed-3bc7a67d5ae4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不過我後來回顧這堂課的筆記。當時教授有講過幾句話，我印象特別深刻。基本上我一聽到就寫下來了。我認為下列3點能概括出："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"這堂課想要教給學生什麼？"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f865d7f0-9c1e-45f4-bfa6-42dd3c2a008f","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"上課筆記"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"13c77175-3a15-468c-ade7-b7454a38a4fd","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0e254c74-50dd-4888-9b06-ef02fb22fc4d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"從臺藝大書畫系的畢業展來看，「水墨畫」的定義已經被解構。紙張上不再只有黑白濃淡。工筆、膠彩畫這些有色彩的畫種，均被系上統稱為水墨畫。換言之，「水墨畫」一詞在系上的認知中，已經成為東方媒材的總稱。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a8432dd5-965e-4b19-bfe4-aa2fdb2e02ca","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f99174c2-47bc-4ca3-ace6-8733f6de868a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"當代藝術是一種思潮。比如在水墨方面，很多人都希望能夠創新。換言之，就算創作者的作畫方式不按照傳統來也沒關係。我們要做的是吸引大家一起來走這條路。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bd03848d-de20-4bde-9d5c-efb18944af3f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"962f7494-e165-4652-b036-942c91010e89"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"要思考自己想要發展的藝術道路。是要繼承傳統以找到突破點，抑或破壞原則從根本上創新？教授認為沒有讓書畫系的同學修這堂課很可惜。（我想這段話也可以理解成：書畫系學生光是學習傳統的理論與技法，就得花上非常久的時間。）"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"082d7d92-d07f-4ec4-a207-1e2cd2f8830a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我的課前程度"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4d4a572d-5a92-4334-a564-161f5963cc64"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"由於教室裡很多都是其他學院的學生。有設計、傳播和表演學院，也有同樣是美術學院非書畫系的學生。因此老師也知道在場很多人可能完全沒有接觸過書畫。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"54662d38-41c1-4495-bee8-092656166bbc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b8d275bd-7843-4cf5-be7b-da36b471aaba"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我就是完全沒碰過書畫的人。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/607c2708-7eaf-4627-8a9e-1d58c87eeb54","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"我在高中沒有選考水墨書畫"},{"type":"text","text":"。當時我判斷大學的設計科系幾乎都不採計水墨書畫，於是我就果斷放掉該科目了。簡言之，我從小到大都沒有握毛筆的經驗。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"29ca7229-253e-4c49-9039-b96c1dc45476"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"307e6bf2-bfbe-4111-b387-4fe3aee03deb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"綜合來說，當代水墨論述的授課內容講得算是淺顯易懂，卻也不會簡單到很無聊。至少課程是滿吸引我的，讓自己還留有這則筆記。"}]}]}
cards.title: 💭當代水墨論述

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"211e720a-cf88-4627-87fb-306081058a6b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🌾無裹粉的麻糬臉"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9bf01892-f451-4638-a04b-fe98b90ba0ac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"朋友捏住我的臉，摸一摸感覺不對勁就甩手。他搓揉手指，說我的臉油油的。不過他的表情沒有嫌惡，反而欣慰地看著我說：「你的臉圓圓的，真的好像麻糬哦！」我本來以為他會接著嫌棄油膩的部分，於是我馬上接著講：「是食物都會油油的啊！」我沒有接續他的欣慰。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b14e2339-25c7-4f78-ba22-1c7b3cd65eb5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1de71fdd-a774-459a-8360-a3692efb0ab7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我腦中還沉浸在油油的話題裡。我咕噥著：「麻糬要裹粉，摸起來才不會濕濕黏黏的。」然後我就立即想到自己的臉就是「沒有裹粉的麻糬」！所以表面才無法保持乾爽的狀態。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dbde0d68-6e4c-4d5c-b750-6788e31aa328"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c85effb9-0819-449b-a036-40aeeeb8e0dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我認為以這個詞形容自己還挺貼切。雖然臉的油膩跟麻糬黏呼呼的觸感仍舊不同。不過我平時也沒有化妝的習慣，因此臉的表面確實沒有「粉」。我開心地手舞足蹈，興奮地跟朋友說自己的臉是沒有裹粉的麻糬。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0adb1623-8327-4432-b740-f9a53aa5a88e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"950d1af0-95ca-4a75-8eb9-bbb066928e4b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"好景不常，對方眉頭一皺，彷彿在告訴我：「你有啥毛病？」"}]}]}
cards.title: 🌾無裹粉的麻糬臉

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b99e53d0-06e5-44d5-84a3-fd69da449486","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭彩虹白水晶"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d6c0f59a-81a6-4142-9917-a8c2b168eee1","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202403151741944.jpeg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"60%","originalHeight":1920,"originalWidth":1080,"alignment":"left"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"028bf2ac-b2c7-4c70-9b75-911243627bda"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8ba47520-72ab-421d-9493-5062ad90d150"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"坐久了感覺自己的身體很冷，於是我走到後陽台曬曬太陽。然而光是呆站著也很無聊，所以我蹲下來玩起角落的石頭。而當我將白水晶柱擺到陽光之下，便意外發現地面四散的彩虹光束。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"46e0d0f4-6317-4368-9677-c6266edf86cc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4fdc41e8-2e96-4f72-a010-753be8e9ed7b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"無心擺石石成虹。"}]}]}
cards.title: 💭彩虹白水晶

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"137a5e4e-7a49-4988-87c5-f5f39a37adbe","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政程序法第2條第2項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"309704c1-90e1-425c-a06e-5ccb2ffac5b4"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawSingle.aspx?pcode=A0030055&flno=2","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"行政程序法第2條第2項"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"60aaab58-03bc-4fd2-9571-a6f82b92cccf"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc18eb77-7b4d-4829-9cc2-22c60807444b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"本法所稱行政機關，係指代表國家、地方自治團體或其他行政主體表示意思，從事公共事務，具有單獨法定地位之組織。"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8a767685-5f83-4cd7-9f6a-99b11fe9abf1","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"說明與應用"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"63242d0e-6ffc-4be9-b621-c6ec0c055139"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行政機關之定義"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9b3fa563-9ba6-438e-8ddf-b5aa62ddea0c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c907b169-d722-43c0-ba66-b5c55082f610"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"學說上則對行政機關定義為：行政主體內部依法設置，就行政事務，得以自己名義決定並表示行政主體意思於外部之具有獨立地位的組織體。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 行政程序法第2條第2項

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3317f6b3-dba3-4fca-a01c-ee49bcd68ddc","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法律中的「具體」與「抽象」"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b690f0d0-1ab4-4ad1-a521-70254e9cab9a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不是體感上覺得明確就等於具體，不清楚就是抽象。在法律的認知中，具體或抽象取決於兩個因素："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a9b2ce77-2430-4d3e-b794-72ede3073428","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d49df373-5183-4245-a871-41379ab9bacf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相對人特定/不特定"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c07c3038-2060-47b9-b1b8-a2ec807a09ff","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"18e1a603-5068-43bd-bccb-1bc059ac0710"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相關事實具體／抽象"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a9224806-ac79-436f-91cd-ad6e41b757d9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"判斷標準：行政行為的效力一次性/反覆出現"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"877fd1d4-34f1-444b-8bfd-d2c2f24c8b4f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4227af55-155a-43a0-bb58-f0b2678fb35b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法律之所以要嚴格定義具體和抽象的原因，在於並非所有事件都能以行政處分規範。只有事件中的對象特定，而且相關事實具體（效力一次性），我們才能說某個事件是具體的；反過來說，假如某個事件不符合具體的特徵，行政機關卻誤判能以行政處分規範該事件。那樣勢必會出問題。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f3ab225-906b-49b8-b407-fe2cf8eec901"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a4854d10-2639-4c67-aad0-65f635a4934a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"於是考試題目也會經常請考生判斷：文中敘述的事件是否符合具體性？那對於下一階段的作答至關重要。因為後續我們才能定義行政行為的類型，並提出相關法規以控制行政機關的權力。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"69980ec9-c247-4c89-ac3e-6595bb62fed8","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"事件特徵之區分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5dddd8eb-ee9d-46b9-9bfe-d4402d8c00be"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"事件的特徵不同，則行政機關應採取的行政行為也會不同。詳情請參考下列表格："}]},{"type":"table","attrs":{"id":"7943ce82-ad6f-4f3b-9dd6-6c712248969f","hasRowHeader":false,"hasColumnHeader":false},"content":[{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"14c4dade-3a45-4edc-adbc-050a3cfd89b6"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"c692b044-6792-4530-83dc-c295844ee5f3","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[142.538709269221],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e240bc6a-29eb-4ebf-b93d-0e69b89f262a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相對人➡️"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bd5ae6db-a9e1-48e2-b89a-4687ef674833"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相關事實⬇️"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"70027d56-ce32-4de7-9876-9428186881da","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[142.8978824531345],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"833af312-b9fd-4250-9c5f-262f95df0ae2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"特定"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"95ee8548-f66b-4181-a7e0-cea029119df0","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[148.81745591739207],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b83045f3-f5c9-4281-8b41-1139816e15d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不特定"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"5cb1f884-cd0f-4ea0-ae18-a9e3f60b6256"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"889cdd1a-bf73-47da-bc3a-549cce2d3558","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[142.538709269221],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"099062f9-9076-48d0-9670-f7d5158e2bc3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具體"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9d59bf91-b9ba-4711-b2ac-4fac3e8b2556"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"（效力一次性）"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"3894776f-87a1-4ad9-b00c-334f3a7aace7","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[142.8978824531345],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5008ec79-6908-49a6-8504-d95323f06b41"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/3ad15af9-4c62-4a27-9cfc-d621ab4f4621","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"典型之行政處分"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e4f74847-4840-476d-a13a-65ef0065eab9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f67ce66c-2164-4468-aeb6-0910f3ad9a8b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第92條第1項"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"6893b394-31ed-49ad-badd-aadb71dd8028","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[148.81745591739207],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87813f8b-697e-4880-817c-026d8fcea780"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/9e046223-9f86-4da0-bda6-93cd0f0eb1d8","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"對人一般處分"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"76287877-1078-4dd3-93f6-ba7da6ca4ea8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d487fa8b-0af8-4596-8789-b6af5ac27df1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第92條第2項前段"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"3cc8ed98-fde2-472b-9f61-05d7929679c9"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"40e251e8-4271-4135-8182-601374158be3","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[142.538709269221],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba55245e-b15e-4637-a6c9-d24af4e12c43"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"抽象"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"df4beaed-b449-4e64-8367-de00920e9a96"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"（效力反覆）"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"92951f2c-bcb9-483b-aec9-7bf423b85369","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[142.8978824531345],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57b09714-2318-49b6-94e7-de64e6c608ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具持續效力之行政處分"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e8890c96-98d7-4912-a926-97fc9811dbad","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c80dd692-8b2d-4cb5-8781-916a70fb2be4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第128條第1項第1款"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"ccbf1704-496b-4b21-8e06-1560e5eff69b","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[148.81745591739207],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e16a936-3da7-4614-bb85-8973de12eff8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對物一般處分（對物生效）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"37fbce6f-70ac-4109-9916-836ea7c446eb","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0377f841-b1a7-49f3-b0a8-8c5dc3b8af8d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第92條第2項後段"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2dbb8ef1-0875-4d1b-8674-f10e72b04b8a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/83d33a73-89a3-4ec1-8374-b89ccf6a78c2","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"法規命令"},{"type":"text","text":"（對人生效）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5920ef45-f1e2-4ff5-8410-cc8493da2f13","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e37bd4e-1de7-490e-b7d8-6c27bbf818b4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第150條"}]}]}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 法律中的「具體」與「抽象」

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a22c24ff-7ee9-4660-8ac9-fe0eb60c2db1","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🌾對人一般處分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e999ca8-6722-47aa-8692-6750156edddc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"國內失業率居高不下。一群人對政府很不滿，於是跑到總統府前抗議。他們大喊口號：「XXX（總統）下台"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"！"},{"type":"text","text":"」其他民眾聽到聲響，也慢慢聚集過來。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"35ac35fb-6115-4b20-8193-774e0bfcf5e3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87ca8b35-5944-4551-bd32-e84246e6c26d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"該集會遊行未經事先申請。依照《集會遊行法》25條第1項，警察可要求抗議民眾解散，是為解散命令。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"0d6628e7-9b26-44bc-bc0f-593f9302dd4d"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6133ad0a-d2a3-497d-9b54-291238964d39"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawSingle.aspx?pcode=D0080058&flno=25","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"集會遊行法第25條第1項"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e969b56-b57e-4fc4-bbe8-4bf47a2a9a3c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有左列情事之一者，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"該管主管機關得予警告、制止或命令解散"},{"type":"text","text":"："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e07e4aa7-cc90-4f56-addf-ac56c364c057"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一、應經許可之集會、"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"遊行未經許可"},{"type":"text","text":"或其許可經撤銷、廢止而擅自舉行者。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"023a31f0-20c2-4562-a59d-bed78207b4fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"二、經許可之集會、遊行而有違反許可事項、許可限制事項者。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"99a7bcd2-59f7-41b7-89b0-a3b7e8d44906"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"三、利用第八條第一項各款集會、遊行，而有違反法令之行為者。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4ffce9c9-fabf-4a48-afbc-6f46b71fb314"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"四、有其他違反法令之行為者。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1f0566c2-7da5-4f81-8380-194b8e0cd3d2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bb999b74-b335-4907-9e6e-dc3c10a7c06c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"解散命令屬於「對人一般處分」。後續本文將詳細說明，對人一般處分的兩個重要特徵："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8343ff46-d1cc-4f6a-9e43-54cfd6005c9e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"754e7328-94ad-47f0-aead-b3f8d73a0d36"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對象不特定（非全然）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c9404382-86e4-45dc-851f-ca1fa78784cc","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de484891-3895-493b-ba5f-93eb79379f41"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相關事實具體"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d62eca98-f65c-41df-9090-a15b93563865","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對象不特定（非全然）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1189fedf-ccac-490c-8444-a0aa4dfd60ba"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對人一般處分不是典型的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/3ad15af9-4c62-4a27-9cfc-d621ab4f4621","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"行政處分"},{"type":"text","text":"。原因就在於其規範不特定的對象，所以並不符合行政處分中"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/7481a502-f458-45ce-bdd1-b2d829ca8326","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"具體性"},{"type":"text","text":"的要素。例如一群抗議民眾就不是特定的對象，因為警察無法指名道姓違法者是誰。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4d69d583-99a3-413a-9c78-7e175bcb7dca","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"典型行政處分vs. 對人一般處分"}]},{"type":"table","attrs":{"id":"f466cade-fd6e-4816-b251-4e50e8e57185","hasRowHeader":true,"hasColumnHeader":true},"content":[{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"455284e9-4d0f-405f-a275-5cebab9528a2"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"7c845177-cc94-47bd-9c84-ada7bfd1702e","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[177.9828216491055],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"755545f6-889b-4cb2-9718-e69a7e564969"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相對人（=對象）➡️"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"df6ba093-c48b-4728-becf-69a05683dc9d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相關事實⬇️"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"49bb8820-17b6-4e0d-8913-6f1cbd24b20b","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[130.91969896955095],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c8c3e88a-21b1-45bc-9463-f0eeddd5f185"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"特定"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"53c61dee-1db7-46d3-be02-5716ed951cda","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[142.9278494847755],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"933a246d-20f1-4621-a890-5ef545808169"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不特定"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"4b856439-179c-4462-87d9-bb5bd26d77a3"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"d756f477-c0d9-41d6-bb69-1683b8d641df","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[177.9828216491055],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e3031f5f-8eaf-46b6-9af2-b2542c2163fd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具體（效力一次性）"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"d5d9aee5-3d29-47ee-8368-82e0e716733d","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[130.91969896955095],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8f28ebed-cca1-4f60-9f72-0bafd0c60832"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"典型之行政處分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e881da83-8083-4339-8dae-b8766fd3e755"}}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"2b137430-ca0b-4f15-8f6c-2dddd7050094","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[142.9278494847755],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"86d53ed1-85ee-4c6b-b51a-1952f5166efa"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"對人一般處分"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0de67daa-f9ca-4e53-908b-90e14f7088da"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但那群抗議的民眾真的可以稱做「不特定」嗎？當警察要求他們解散時，應解散者就是那群「2024年3月24日早上9:00，在總統府前非法集會的民眾」。換言之，抗議民眾不是「全然的特定」，而是屬於「非全然的不特定」。也就是根據時間地點，還是可以框住的一群人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d822e518-d2fa-4ab6-b8b1-895653312cbe"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9809ee73-15bb-45b4-809d-1cf3b20b7bd7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對人一般處分的定義位於《行政程序法》第92條第2項。並且「非全然不特定」在條文中稱作「依一般性特徵可得特定」："}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"f524023a-b47b-4a5e-9600-3dc1817ad253"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b07dc635-df5e-469d-819a-0574a892960c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d411c3e1-84e7-4776-8f91-de9f55c6a1de"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"678aaf5d-a3fc-4bee-b078-4b12a85e94a3"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/6c02f9a7-0a7b-4c01-86e2-81968c590a53","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}},{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"前項"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"決定或措施之相對人雖非特定，而依一般性特徵可得確定其範圍者，為一般處分"},{"type":"text","text":"，適用本法有關行政處分之規定。有關公物之設定、變更、廢止或其一般使用者，亦同。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"856e6c9d-6d51-4241-a9fe-c9ec74ab3381"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de6bd4c7-02a1-42a0-9fca-29fa19acb1ea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"要特別注意，法條中寫的「一般處分」並不包含"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/0770bd77-5c8d-42dd-87c9-87860e51b04b","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"對物一般處分"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2e46eb3-3569-4d35-8b5a-77c321c0f1ea"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a38232fa-93ad-45ca-b7c1-cdf440c7ce48"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"除了這裡講的「非全然不特定」，對象不特定還有另一種類型是「全然不特定」。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/83d33a73-89a3-4ec1-8374-b89ccf6a78c2","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"法規命令"},{"type":"text","text":"規範的就是後者。試想對人一般處分如果規範全然不特定的對象，那解散事件會變得很奇妙：「當警察在總統府前舉牌，全國人民都要就地解散。」"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ccdca45e-05cd-487e-86ee-4936dd88a925"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a3b3cb45-4119-46dd-95ff-0b62529147e4","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相關事實具體"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7beeae60-0834-4ae8-b14c-44767208250b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相關事實具體與否，其判斷標準是：行政行為的效力是一次還是反覆出現？換言之，假如一個行政行為的效力反覆，那麼對應的相關事實就是抽象。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2bd777a6-c38d-4e1f-9452-198c3888c9b1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e0a6d7d-78aa-464a-aeb4-80b1aababda3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對人一般處分的效力為一次性。警察舉起「行為違法」的牌子，並手持麥克風警告群眾：「現在時間是早上9:00，你們要立刻就地解散。」解散命令欲規範的相關事實是具體的，僅針對「當下的違法集會」生效。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f66587e7-1a21-4b34-87ea-24d3b99b2c77"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b1edd6ba-1d82-4fa5-8bbf-95f44a9f852e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"反過來說，倘若解散命令的效力反覆。那麼警察舉完牌之後，人民每天經過總統府都得自行解散。如此相關事實就是抽象的。因為警察的警告並不是規範某種具體事件，而是大家無時無刻都得遵守。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b63d84d4-8e64-443f-a467-c42107562a0e"}}]}
cards.title: 🌾對人一般處分

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c6307701-aedd-4ca6-bf32-a7b17e72a20a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💭對物一般處分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa458c7f-55f6-40c6-907a-b0cf7946ad30"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A先生離鄉背井到都市打拼。他已經好久沒回老家了。有一天他接到老母親的電話。另一頭語氣興奮地說：「兒子啊！你還記得你奶奶老家嗎？就是破破爛爛的那棟。它是古蹟呀！」"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"45686fc6-1ecb-40a3-9690-3c22215b7b17"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b381d51-8d79-482c-9b16-e3e75b8b01ef"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"母親說話沒頭沒尾。A先生問了半天，仍不知道老家怎麼就成了古蹟。於是A先生趁著周末回鄉。原來市政府發公文（函）下來，表示鄭成功曾經住過奶奶的那棟房子。所以市政府依照"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawAll.aspx?pcode=H0170001&kw=%e6%96%87%e5%8c%96%e8%b3%87%e7%94%a2%e4%bf%9d%e5%ad%98%e6%b3%95","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"《文化資產保存法》"},{"type":"text","text":"，將A先生的老家設定為古蹟。同時全國人民都不可以去破壞它。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"14518f41-6b37-4c6c-9d96-03eb20d6c85e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc96716d-2c58-44ed-94af-6a4c70ca1a76"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"市政府強制將民宅指定為古蹟，是一種「對物一般處分」。下文將介紹何謂對物一般處分。並且其下還細分成四種類型："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f85f9cd1-230c-4419-8e93-18fb8bf6bd65","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6e0f325f-5c4f-4e30-85b3-4b23287dd803"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"特徵說明與比較"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9695db34-0a93-4602-91b3-42d88524ae3a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9bb03645-143d-4012-bffe-ab10b0b60b4e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"四種類型"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5b6f8c1b-ed33-44ea-9915-497f627eef00","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"特徵說明與比較"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4cdb911d-4301-4332-b7e5-92878a283c01"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對物一般處分的敘述，在《行政程序法》第92條第2項後段："}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"504a7113-e66e-4de6-a4da-e1a6912ed9e9"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c2ded17-e6b2-4321-99d2-11039da70f37"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d411c3e1-84e7-4776-8f91-de9f55c6a1de"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"945a04d8-6395-4b4a-9aed-ae3fd0da8073"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/6c02f9a7-0a7b-4c01-86e2-81968c590a53","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"前項"},{"type":"text","text":"決定或措施之相對人雖非特定，而依一般性特徵可得確定其範圍者，為一般處分，適用本法有關行政處分之規定。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"有關公物之設定、變更、廢止或其一般使用者，亦同。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3076e554-ec0f-4f87-8376-46b651a4a54c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"「公務之設定、變更、廢止或其一般使用者」指的是對物一般處分的四種類型。由於後文將會談到，因此目前先不解釋。至於結尾「亦同」的意思是：對物一般處分準用行政處分的相關規定。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2dea2909-7cc2-440c-ba49-d8c334248c58"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a56bc7d8-7753-4827-b9e4-378630f9dc40"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"然而對物一般處分並不是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/7481a502-f458-45ce-bdd1-b2d829ca8326","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"典型的行政處分"},{"type":"text","text":"。因為它不符合"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/7481a502-f458-45ce-bdd1-b2d829ca8326","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"具體性"},{"type":"text","text":"。另一方面，縱然對物一般處分與"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/9e046223-9f86-4da0-bda6-93cd0f0eb1d8","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"對人一般處分"},{"type":"text","text":"都不符合具體性──均規範不特定的對象。但兩者的差異在於：對物一般處分規範的相關事實抽象；而對人一般處分規範的相關事實具體。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ffd087e2-ae2e-4e6e-b9b0-e9d6f1ea0dad","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"處分類型比較"}]},{"type":"table","attrs":{"id":"04d6f6d1-0c09-44eb-bd03-a63f2269ccfb","hasRowHeader":true,"hasColumnHeader":true},"content":[{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"95f34a1f-4584-45b7-91e6-0e3e8ef8f626"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"42873b39-9f54-4aca-ad2f-bc3819ec65cf","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[162],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3052cd3f-93f2-4315-a49f-e796ec367d39"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相對人（=對象）➡️"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ac24a0b1-7329-46ad-8441-d594612aa5d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相關事實⬇️"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"a421d164-fc03-4e82-8cf7-8a5bb6bb6dca","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[127.10400000000001],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bb1d38ea-78e0-4457-a1e7-619fb722b34f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"特定"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"b1a0a01f-08ca-478f-94f3-06296b4d2395","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[113.125],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"07dbcace-c80c-4d0f-b5dc-a56e67226975"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不特定"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"d21b067e-1feb-4d9c-8e21-6b2c4ae6a299"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"0d4a27c1-57d5-4cf6-8404-5add035b1856","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[162],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"780c8e5f-d533-4fab-b12b-2f449ec6b735"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具體（效力一次性）"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"5cc29fc8-1b84-40df-a26f-d71a219dddc6","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[127.10400000000001],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"560f6f8e-58fa-46bc-bf02-f5d57bfa5a68"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"典型之行政處分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8a2ad98-25c9-4400-a17a-b21f431e7a03"}}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"df85dc56-42dd-4f61-832c-51c4e8ce2ea3","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[113.125],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"67df4d10-63ae-4cba-92fd-5158bdb812d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對人一般處分"}]}]}]},{"type":"table_row","attrs":{"id":"5695a697-0ad5-4486-98c8-5c7ce8265642"},"content":[{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"cc246c8e-29ba-466f-b3d2-5177fdb38a9a","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[162],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d9425c69-ce70-477e-aaac-92d36608f33e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"抽象（效力反覆）"}]}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"c9073697-1de0-4116-ad52-426dd4774f92","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[127.10400000000001],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f076473e-83fe-4ebb-9d68-684c12c7afe8"}}]},{"type":"table_cell","attrs":{"id":"c079415e-5502-4ca5-85c9-19799e4c87aa","colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":[113.125],"backgroundColor":null,"textColor":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5cb66178-ac7a-4945-b733-90891dc9bcd3"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"對物一般處分"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c56f656-1f0e-47ed-b803-5c87de2ed896"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"從具體性要件的比較中，我們可得出對物一般處分的特徵："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"29d789e1-0f99-4538-b263-085fb6368e74","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9d6c4ad8-c2cf-4e4c-8449-3cbd9ea7d177"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"對象不特定"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c2209618-4689-4d2c-8cf7-1f795386b629","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"020cfade-0202-43be-bb8e-da978bd3975f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"全國人民依照"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://law.moj.gov.tw/LawClass/LawAll.aspx?pcode=H0170001&kw=%e6%96%87%e5%8c%96%e8%b3%87%e7%94%a2%e4%bf%9d%e5%ad%98%e6%b3%95","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"《文化資產保存法》"},{"type":"text","text":"，大家都要把A先生的老家視作古蹟。這裡的「全國人民」即為不特定的對象。畢竟行政機關無法指名道姓誰必須遵守。也就是說，「全國人民」這樣的對象是模糊的，我們無法框住一群特定的人。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a627646f-4f10-44ce-90eb-3865074294f5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3f6ce81e-79c3-4333-90f2-6e817d31954e"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"相關事實抽象（效力反覆）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a69e170c-3e9e-41fb-8202-3e841249433d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"435de2b8-1372-416d-8835-118535ed972a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對物一般處分（古蹟設定）生效之後，人民每時每刻都要把A先生的老家當古蹟。而不是只有某一時間點要把它當作古蹟──否則該處分就是效力一次性，規範的相關事實具體──於是乎，對物一般處分的效力為反覆發生，規範的相關事實抽象。"}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"44fb6a31-23b8-48bb-b325-88ffa13238a9","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"四種類型"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"46d9bdc8-603d-4c99-82fb-01a3bf09b16b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對物的一般處分，又能細分成四種類型。分別是公物之設定、變更、廢止與一般使用。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"642de507-3fc7-4395-a6fa-22bf1268256b"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f51e26f3-37ea-441a-b880-01d2e59eda9e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d411c3e1-84e7-4776-8f91-de9f55c6a1de"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2dbc2c3-a15c-40ba-9dfa-7739b43b9d69"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/64bd9aa3-7039-43b8-a517-d3ce0a4734ac/card/6c02f9a7-0a7b-4c01-86e2-81968c590a53","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"前項"},{"type":"text","text":"決定或措施之相對人雖非特定，而依一般性特徵可得確定其範圍者，為一般處分，適用本法有關行政處分之規定。有關公物之"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"設定"},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"變更"},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"廢止"},{"type":"text","text":"或其"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"一般使用"},{"type":"text","text":"者，亦同。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"eff25d8d-85b0-4bfb-8739-3d4877867264","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8369a2f9-021a-414a-a54e-844d3f377992"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"設定"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2f910e50-31e6-45a1-a079-e70745db0adb","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"08369641-6d06-4ac8-a740-1cf4b00d617f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"劃定某地為保護區或行人徒步區"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0b96b510-daaf-491d-935b-5fbaf13dc91c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a4bc4a7-91da-449a-80bd-fdadbc019759"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"變更"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0423548e-286e-4b75-8efe-0ce24bce849e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"71b48533-a2de-40e6-a76b-ce1038c5dcb5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"街道名稱或門牌號碼之更改"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d47bd973-e791-4d18-812a-f7716d8a6185","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d9957738-1446-4dfd-8fab-8eddc6bd347a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"廢止"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e551668c-bc1f-44a3-b31b-328d6615aaad","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8b3a669-2877-4138-9328-aa1f82f6aa14"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"道路之封閉"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ead6934f-c4b6-4847-a0b1-4192a4af7b87","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a9637224-0a59-415b-82e6-d82882f1b59f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一般使用"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7a174243-4d85-4fcd-a26a-695f6da63ce1","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"82c3dbe0-5732-407b-8c6d-e88983e30015"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"博物館之禁止拍照與攝影"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"742ca92b-cc82-4639-a5e9-7f51ca521a6c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e5b340d-f810-4fdb-a7ca-b53cb681b6a2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"圖書館之相關借閱規定"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8d512542-fb44-4ffb-87da-7d85b3f245d7"}}]}
cards.title: 💭對物一般處分

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4f177ed5-5c9d-438f-b1cc-5d9db9e0fd18","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"沒有選考水墨書畫的原因"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3a151dba-3b5f-4958-8708-5fb63ded67da"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"由於我並非科班出身，再加上當時備考的時間很短（快升高三的暑假才進畫室）。雖然畫室老師建議我以右手練毛筆字，但是我是左撇子。倘若我寫出來的字不能達到右撇子的標準，可能會對考試分數不利。或者說老師打從一開始就不好教我。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dbce54c2-8dc3-49d5-969f-d72270c95dd1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b04eba0-bf44-428b-adff-fba6f973866d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"縱然老師跟我說有去考就好了。只要水墨書畫不要0分，我就有美術科系可以填；不過我那時已經被其他術科搞得焦頭爛額，沒有多餘的心力去學習陌生的科目。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"248bcc8b-b41d-46f0-8944-8ca2daf5c240"}}]}
cards.title: 沒有選考水墨書畫的原因

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8375452d-089f-4bda-b550-3d9ca3aac713","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"《麥肯錫寫作技術與邏輯思考》"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"bf032dc0-6450-4df5-974e-6a7ea74a84f3","src":"https://linyingchen.com/img/202403261654522.webp","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"40%","originalHeight":348,"originalWidth":348,"alignment":"left"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"68c4e1b1-7969-422c-a44b-3d41d0e4d5ca","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a6b491e-b58d-4f36-ace2-a4ebf6a80cb1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原文書名：論理表現力──ロジカル・シンキング＆ライティング"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"53cd2fda-0548-4f58-9247-90291ef8ed1d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2859ec7c-8b3a-4cce-a779-5f569373e9cf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"作者： 高杉尚孝"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"af922769-f168-42bf-99d6-1edc61851a60","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4bc3afab-5e9a-4083-ab9c-ef7937045922"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"譯者： 鄭舜瓏"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2218222b-f6cd-4287-9805-18a59877dd65","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ece1e59-b0e2-422c-85ff-0510050d5366"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"出版社：大是文化"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d389aae3-f90f-40fe-9e39-a0a13cf981d4","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f25894bb-7d13-4872-8ce1-ce4d6164c04e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"出版日期：2018年10月二版一刷"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2c09ef19-2172-44f0-923a-6893cb9d3a44","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f659dd7d-4cf5-4373-9c75-94d09ffbcb31"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ISBN：978-957-9164-62-7"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f2920a58-13e4-45a3-a944-e5b8c0263e6f","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相遇的契機"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"90db542d-1f9d-4b33-a796-75ec1041e945"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"過去，我不知道要怎麼把腦中的想法，轉成文字的形式。那導致我在寫作文、報告或創作理念等等，都要花很久的時間才能擠出來。我一旦碰到文字作業，分數就經常在及格邊緣反覆橫跳。即便我嘗試求助，然而老師也不知道怎麼救「看起來很有想法的我」。只能安慰我多寫就對了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff0aa846-53ea-47a6-b9b0-e3bea6e22d1e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e344447-8990-44aa-8bda-e1b7bc77364c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我之所以擠不出文字，是因為我在書寫時經常懷疑：「為什麼我要先寫這句而不是那句？」在我的理解中，所有資訊經常都是同時出現的，它們彷彿會凝結成一張張照片。舉個例子，假如我所在的空間有一陣風吹過："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"98a0c6b3-e1c1-435c-90bb-31b1001b4471","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8f73371-5b28-4b13-96bf-9cb7cd48c7c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我的感受：聽到風聲＋皮膚涼涼的＋眼前風鈴在搖晃"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e5cde1c3-111c-4cd7-8d0d-1f038c36a108","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b16d703a-1ca6-48fc-affc-6286580cdeff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文字形式：風聲颯颯，我感覺到些許寒意。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"接著"},{"type":"text","text":"我抬頭一看，窗邊的風鈴微微搖曳。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2dd104fc-3a3b-48e9-b5ef-8c55f3473feb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dc4d114e-c8b2-4d33-b677-e21124e54c7a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我以往不能清楚意識到：如果我要將自己的想法轉化文字，我就必須拆寫畫面中的元素。並賦予所有句子先後順序。也就是說，倘若讀者只能從字裡行間理解我的想法，並且當中沒有任何圖像輔助。那麼我就得在書寫時呈現出時間正在流逝的感覺，即便當初我認為所有事情都是同時發生。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1cb7c3f5-736e-441d-b705-83910d432192"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f678caa3-feb1-4278-a3d7-35e1c12aacfb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"這本書著實幫助我理解文字的表達方法。書中附有很多淺顯易懂的實例，提到的領域不會讓我感到很陌生。那讓我能馬上意會前面講的知識點該如何實際應用。我可以站在讀者的角度，知曉易讀的文章該如何撰寫。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2b14cfb1-1788-4619-af97-f77496588c55"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd03f8f9-6ab0-4edb-90b6-d91bca18ae17"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我認為文字也有某種程度的侷限。例如它不能和影像一樣，後者可第一時間提供更多複數信息。（不過沒有任何外在的表達形式，能取代親身體驗。）但我仍舊著迷於書寫文字，因為它始終是最方便我快速表達自身想法的一種形式。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"91e50fc7-deac-4af0-86d4-01fc5a18c770"}}]}
cards.title: 《麥肯錫寫作技術與邏輯思考》

textElements.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c5568ba4-1fd9-480d-968c-c0bf8a62d601"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"欲了解所有類型的差異，請點擊上方的連結。"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e12048a-32c7-425c-a668-ec398c5e5067"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"很多法律的基礎是基於民法，而不是憲法。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f85b8f2e-aa56-4a43-b935-cd260225498b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法律觀念的建構靠民法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7224fe79-1978-4abd-98f1-20701b75a4bb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不會隨便跟別人說違憲"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7ec149ce-7864-4e8e-81f8-6bd96b1d2fce","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5566a15a-3ca1-4d90-a030-79663ba6c4f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"典型之行政處分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f7c3f6b-f3d3-4a94-b573-ff18c41025f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相對人特定，且效力一次性。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c889a4fc-c7ed-45f2-8f12-10d22920ef12"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"35ff7753-f283-470e-b0e9-a1a434b587ca","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62e0762a-d748-43c9-993a-f2ca3b6dfa25"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"據持續效力之行政處分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"db273fde-2ab3-45b8-9977-841c3b63ed90"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相對人特定，且效力反覆。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cfacf806-deee-402e-ad1c-6250efa14b22"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ed6f9e08-2bfe-478f-ba7b-028fecc60627","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5b10a38c-77a0-4dd8-90f7-f4f7736584ec"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對人一般處分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"67776b29-3c1c-47d2-b368-263db4c4a139"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相對人不特定，且效力一次性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"236421b0-bd6c-4d59-9bdd-967b8e94e71c"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9aff846f-01ba-4c5f-a021-0c2a753a9c73","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"519f7fa8-386e-4e66-a171-06854c99e4f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"對物一般處分"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"48882985-43e0-4751-bcda-f0781db8c45d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相對人不特定，且效力反覆。"}]}]}]}
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"083d82fb-11c8-4313-9c82-e9d7a54d0d3b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主題：自我探索。不確定會不會有。"}]}]}
